desc: Felt home the moment we sat down . We were recommended by our friends to try this steamboat restaurant as we are all fan of buffets . We were greeted warmly at the entrance by the staff who then lead us to a cosy nice corner of the restaurant . She patiently and professionally explained the type of soup available and also suggested us their popular Double Boiled Pork Bone Collagen Soup from Japan which turns out to be our best ever steamboat buffet dinner that evening . Throughout the dinner the staffs and the manageress too were very attentive to our needs and they served other tables equally well too . They were seen always with smiles on their faces and i felt your organisation is really lucky to have them . Please help us to convey our sincere thanks to them and kudos for

title: good
desc: great lunch at the coffee house of M hotel . the service staff were great polite and awesome food selection. the staff were chatty and helpful I would come back again and also recommend this restaurant to all my colleagues.

title: Great relaxing stay & celebrations over the weekends!
desc: Me and my friends had a stay over at M hotel to create a wonderful bday surprise celebration for our Friend at M hotel family suite yesterday. The suite was first of all very clean and relaxing to stay in, room and the beds was big enough for four of us, and also the jacuzzi, I love it! I would like to thank Clarice for the fast check in and also her given generous late check out. ‚ò∫Ô∏è And also not forgetting Alice for her warm genuine service at the lobby lounge. Thanks to M hotel and the lovely service robot for letting us create a special memorable occasion. üëç

title: "Spacious and Pleasant !!!"
desc: Staying at M Hotel for 3 nights on a business trip. Check-in was smooth and fast even though i arrived late evening they offered me a room upgrade. The rooms are spacious and well equipped. Ask for a higher floor and a view of the city. Loving my stay :)

title: Good food and good service
desc: The staff of M Hotel provide the best service during our stay. Cafe 2000 very good and food selection for buffet is scrumptious. Housekeeping staff on the 25 floor is kind and friendly. She make my room spotless clean everyday. Reception is always busy, beside waiting to queue for room, the staff is never impatient, they are welcoming. I appreciate the service from Valery Han, she is dedicated and going for the extra mile to ensure we have the best stay. A sincere thank you to all the staff of M Hotel for the wonderful stay.

title: A well run hotel
desc: Stayed at M Hotel for a couple of nights. Overall a great experience at the hotel. a) It's a well run hotel b) Clean, and spacious c) Service is excellent d) Breakfast spread is good e) Friendly staff

title: Feeling a bit tired
desc: On a business trip this hotel is conveniently located in CBD. It‚Äôs well laid out with all expected facilities such as pool, gym and spa. The rooms are a good size and well appointed. The breakfast is a little disappointing and if staying again I would eat out rather than tick this option. This is a 4 star hotel that is starting to feel a little tied and in need of a makeover. Overall functional rather than luxurious.

title: Rajkeshwar Prasad
desc: My experience in M Hotel was awesome. The room ambience was good and the most interesting thing is the water and food served by robot. The variety of breakfast was good with so many items. Good transport facility of bus and Tanjong Pager MRT. Really satisfied by the services of duty manager Lolita.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Arrival at hotel . First impression very good service staff. Check in was fast. Room is clean and nice and quiet. Breakfast very morning is important and M hotel serve good breakfast. Check out is fast and good . Ms Valery who assisted me was friendly. I will come back for more business trip.

title: Room was excellent
desc: 1st time in Singapore for business meetings. Stay in M hotel was great room was very spacious. The service specially the staff was amazing specially their manager Lolita. She was amazing and professional Food was also have a lot of choices. Planning to comeback again in future for only travels.

title: 'Always good to be home'
desc: M Hotel is going to be my first home soon. Always feel welcome by all the M Champion. The best service always! Special mention: Front office, Valery, Andy, Helmmie, Kanna, Zainal, Juri, Ridwan, Sali, Clarice, Alice, Tea, Maggie, Chloe, Cindy, Vishalini, F&B, Sara, Suja, Amie The housekeeping staff who clean my room on the 28th floor and the aunty who pick up my laundry everyday. (Sorry didnt get their name). Thank you to all the champions in M HOTEL. They walk the mile and beyond.

title: Stay 1 day only
desc: Very good hotel. room big and clean and quiet. restaurant & foods also good the staff at cafe is friendly. Bell man Zainal helpful with calling taxi. Reception Alice and Cindy and Clarice helpful. Valery is a good leader to them. A team of processionaland happy people.

title: Hotel 5 star
desc: Good place,nice place,delicious food,cozy place,valery is very nice, the receptionist cindy and alice are helpful and attentive and nice to everyone.the place has good accomodation.the people are very helpful.

title: Business
desc: Good hotel, nice location, very clean, good service, staff are very approachable, freindly, nice restaurant good food, staff valery and Cindy are very helpful, awesome place to go I come back for more.

title: Good hotel
desc: This hotel is very nice. Comes with beautiful ambiance and nice hotel staff's especially Ms. Valery for being a good and very hospitable person. I highly recommended this hotel for the special family vacation or any other event you may do here in Singapore. It also have a nice room and very delicious foods that I will surely will make you happy.

title: Day use crew
desc: Goos impression! Front desk staff Valery is helpful and help us with rooms on the same floor. Ahe ia professional and quick in handling matters. Good lunch at cafe 2000, many good food. Hope to stay more days!

title: Amazing staff
desc: It was agreat stay at M Hotel,i had stayed in this hotel with my friends for staycation. During checkin we are unlucky that the room was not ready.The staff informed us the checkin time is 2pm. I was being assisted by the name of Lolita who was really helpful pleasant and professional.Thank you

title: Fancy and very comfortable room
desc: This was my second visit to M Hotel Singapore and both of them were amazing! First time staying in this hotel and they offered me free upgrade room. The room was very nice and spacey! Staff is also friendly especially Miss Lolita. On my second visit, I got upgraded for free again and it was amazing! Very recommended place to stay. Oh they also have unique and cute robot in the lobby to assist you everything. Try try!

title: Dissapointed
desc: Booked M hotel for my boyfriend's birthday, reservation team mention that birthday amenities will be placed in the room. But once I check in I dun see anything in the room. This doesn't matter, once I was exploring the room, I realised that the mini bar was being consume? Just too disappointed. Wouldn't want to go back M hotel again.

title: Amazing
desc: Stay was great, excellent service in M Hotel. Luggage was assisted by Sali. attentive manager Lolita. Very welcoming and accomodating. Room was big and clean. Breakfast is great. Will be back again because of the warm welcome and service

title: Perfectly nice hotel, with good sized rooms
desc: The M Hotel is in a decent location, five minutes' walk from Tanjong Pager Metro station and about 20 minutes' walk to all the restaurants and bars on Marina Bay behind Fullerton Road. The M Hotel itself is pretty good. Nice welcoming and friendly staff are always happy to help. My room was a good size with a reasonable sized bathroom. A little dark perhaps with quite a low ceiling and a fairly small window, giving a view of some apartments and a bit of the docks. Very quiet and made good nights' sleep Nice breakfast served, with plenty of variety. Not much communal space to meet or work. Overall, not bad.

title: Pretty good hotel but some attitudes need changing
desc: The front desk upon check-in must have been going through a rough day as she did not seem very happy to be checking me in. I also don't recall hearing any details on where breakfast would be, and from what time to what time - which is a standard upon check-in. Room I got was a deluxe room, and it was pretty spacious and clean - pretty satisfied with the room although I think the bathroom if not having any hand-held shower head/handshower should have a bidet. Breakfast buffet at the cafe downstairs - food was ok but the place is pretty small, and if they are serving group tours, you'll find the place packed to the brim. Pretty convenient location - a short walk away from loads of restaurants (especially Japanese) as well as supermarket/convenience stores. Staff attitude

title: Wonderful stay at M Hotel Singapore
desc: It was a great experience staying in one of the best Hotels in Singapore. With complementary breakfast, free laundary (2 pcs per day) and free transportation every morning. The food and drinks were also excellent.

title: The only good thing was the location
desc: From our confirmation letter, the rate description said minibar was included. However, the clerk explained that meant they had a minibar in the room didn't mean you can have drinks and foods in minibar for free. Also, one of my colleague was refused to have breakfast even the rate included breakfast. They finally let my colleague have the breakfast. However, it made us feel they had their own way to explain what they offer even that was black and white on the confirmation letter. Btw, the rate they offered to corporate as the contract price is much higher than the price you booked online by yourself. M hotel doesn't have BRG like other hotels supported. For business, you might get a better hotel at this price. Other than these above, it's a hotel with good location. The room

title: Center of Singapore
desc: I ended up staying in a Loft with facilities on one level from the bed which was a mattress on the floor. Not at all impressed. The stairs to the bathroom are slippery and dangerous. I would not stay here again

title: Celebrating Father in law 80 birthday at The Buffet
desc: Foods at buffet are excellent the services are also professional and up to standard. My family members and friends were all very happy and enjoyed.Would like to take this opportunities to thank the service staffs Yao Yao, Zhi Ying, Siew Kim and Amelyn for the arrangement. Not forgetting back of the house staffs Uncle Lim and all the Chefs especially Chef Chan‚Äô s team for the fantastic dessert and cake, Chef Bee Lay, Chef Foo‚Äôs teams, Chef John‚Äôs teams, Chef Boz, Chef Terrance and Chef Elmer. Without all of your effort we can‚Äôt make the birthday celebration a successful one.

title: Great service and staff
desc: Check in was a little chaotic there was a long queue,however the queue was attended to in a fast manner. This was my 3rd time staying here the service was as good as usual and i recieved a room upgrade as a regular. Staff remember me by my name which was a remarkable thing for me... the breakfast as always crwded which is good for business i guess.. Overall good for me...

title: Impressed
desc: I stayed in M Hotel for 3 days. The service was very impressive. Reception staff was welcoming and always willing to help. The room is big and spacious. Cafe has good spread of breakfast items. Check out was fast and no problem. Good location and good service hotel. Will come back again.

title: My Birthday
desc: When the front desk staff know that is my Birthday staycation, she was so kind to upgrade me to a premier room with King bed. I was like wow..... when I found a piece of cake in my room after my dinner appointment. Good job M Hotel, thank you for giving me a memorable day.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights. Room was very spacious and clean. Would recommend this for business especially if you need to work in the room after a day of meetings. Largest work desk among the similar room types and hotels I have stayed in. Staff members were all very helpful. Food was good except for breakfast. Also it's really packed for breakfast you would be seated so close to other people feeling like it's a bench. One thing to note is that they have free shuttle the office area near Raffle Quay.

title: Nice business hotel
desc: Room size is big, room very clean. Very convenient to go around, close to business area. Lots of restaurant around the hotel. Decorations of the hotel lobby is very modern. Would recommend if you are going for business in Singapore.

title: Very OK but the gym is not
desc: Stayed here for 3 days while on business trip Very friendly staff and good location All ok but the gym is not, many of the equipment did not work Howvere apart from that I can recommend this hotel Breakfast very good and there is a robot making eggs at the club lounge

title: Excellent Service
desc: We are regular users of the M Hotel. The service is always excellent. The management team of Andy and Valery always ensure a warm welcome, they quickly resolve any issues and provide "value-added" service through personal attention and identifying opportunities to "delight" us. The concierge service is also always friendly, helpful and efficient (the robot concierge is less so!).

title: Short Stay, Amazing help
desc: My stay at M Hotel was divided between Anson Road and the harbour hotel. The lady who checked me in settled me in the Tea Lounge, organized a cup of tea and sandwiches and checked for cancellations and guest flexibility to give me the full week at a single place. Finally she managed to get me a week at the Harbour Branch, called me cab, got me checked in and I thought all of this was really above and beyond her duties.

title: Business district hotel
desc: I stayed for a few nights including a weekend in this hotel. It is a 5-7 minutes walk from Tanjong Pagor MRT station but Singapore is quite hot to walk. There are not much shops or eating houses open during the weekend in this business district. We stayed in a Club room which seemed to be renovated before. The shower head is fixed on the wall and not removable. The water power seemed to be weak to me. The room is facing a container port view. The escalator needs to insert the room card to move but the slot does not function very well so that the escalator moves before you successfully insert. The breakfast provide just some choices.

title: Decent business hotel
desc: M Hotel is located strategically in the CBD area, making it very accessible to many offices and enabling it to be the top choice for many business travelers. Hotel room size is on average bigger than other hotels, however the air conditioning within the room was extremely weak - the room temperature barely changed even after adjusting the thermostat temperature to a much lower one. As a result, the room was stuffy without much air flow. Breakfast was decent - the choices are similar to any other business hotel.

title: 2 night stopover
desc: Excellent accommodation, friendly & very helpful staff, good breakfast. Spacious lobby, restaurant on ground floor. Located near to the harbour & a short walk to the subway. Check in & out was fairly quick & receptionists very welcoming . Wish we could have stayed longer.

title: Another amazing stay
desc: Here again for business. Cant complaint about the service at all.. though the hotel seems busy the front desk staff are all very happy and smiley. Got an upgrade this time with great view. I see there are some works goin on in the hotel. But well planned

title: Very enjoyable!
desc: Stayed here for 2 weeks whilst working in our Singapore office, very good location. The rooms were spacious and comfortable. The restaurant offers buffet every day but also has a small but decent a la carte menu. The bar is great with live music on several nights of the week and an outside area where smoking is permitted whilst enjoying a nice glass of wine. Thank you Princess Kay for some really enjoyable evenings, you make traveling alone a lot less lonely. Overall very positive experience!

title: Comfortable Stay In Hotel
desc: This business hotel is best suited for those who need to commute within the CBD. The rooms are spacious and well furnished. We had a good night‚Äôs sleep in their comfortable beds.A unique feature is the service robot that delivers your requests for additional towels and toiletries to your room.The Tanjong Pagar MRT Station is a 10 minutes walk from the hotel.Taxis and Grab easily available.Checkin took more than 20 minutes as only 2 staff were on duty.There were only 4 chairs at the checkin lobby for those waiting to be checked in.This resulted in a long queue milling around the checkin. Also as M Hotel is located in a business district, the areas surrounding the hotel are deserted after working hours.

title: Nice rooms but poor service at reception
desc: We stayed 2 nights. The room had a very nice view of the habour and very comfortable. Easily accessible via MRT. We had a very bad experience at the reception during the check in as well as check out. At the check in, there was a long queue and only two counters were functioning. The room was pre booked, but the total waiting time was nearly 1 hr. After going through the whole process, we asked whether we can keep the deposit in USD, which was strongly refused by the lady who was handling our check in, putting us in a very difficult situation as we did not except such request. She wanted us to keep the deposit in Sing dollars.This was requested, because all the hotels where we stayed during our previous visits accepted USD as deposits. Even during check out, the waiting time

title: Worst nightmare in my life
desc: This is the worst experience I ever have. I can pass a few things like having room maintenance sounds during the day but having fire alarm goes off on 2:20 AM is not!!! I was tried to call and no one picked up I was tried to go down and ask and the lift doesn‚Äôt work!!! False alarm or not we need some explanation!!!!

title: Rare value for money gem in Singapore
desc: Totally recommend M Hotel. It‚Äôs such an underrated gem in Singapore‚Äôs hotel landscape. For the pricepoint they offer, you get amazingly sized room that has decently new furnishings. Bed was exceptionally comfortable, ensuring I had a really good sleep every night. Room was clean and comfortable too. Very much felt like a home away from home. Highly recommended.

title: Birthday Celebration
desc: Booked the hotel to celebrate my birthday. No special request was made. But to my surprise, the receptionist noticed my birthday while registering me and wished me. Return to my room to see a slice of cake on the table at night. Thank you for making my stay memorable and being attentive, Clarice.

title: E+E=E Services
desc: We have stayed over the weekend, during checked out there was a dispute on billing. Fortunately, Ms Valery the duty mfr has been very attentive. She is good at her products knowledge. As she managed to rectify our issues & clear it efficiently & effectively. Bravo to her excellent services.

title: Nice business hotell
desc: Was here for a few nights mainly for business... A nice hotel with Roberts servicing amenities and making breakfast. The lift can take a while especially in the mornings. Well other then that service was good from the reception girls and the guys at the restaurant. Food was good but good to avoid the peak timings... All else great.

title: Birthday staycation
desc: Stayed over the weekend for my husband Birthday celebration. Was greeted by front desk staff Cindy with smiles. Valery was thoughtful to arrange a upgraded room with a slice of cake with wishes on it. It was a surprise and enjoyable stay. Check out by an Indian lady Ruby, she was speaking to me in mandarin and smiling always. Well done M Hotel team.

title: Good all round hotel, value for money
desc: I was booked into the M Hotel by my Singapore partner. trhis was my 1st time at the hotel. i spent 3 x nights. The rooms were large & comfortable, it was quiet though in the CBD & the service at all times was good.

title: Excellent stay
desc: Nice window view, very clean and safe place, nice bathroom and swimming pool. Excellent buffet. Ambiance excellent. Very responsive staff. Got late for cruise but staff provided taxi in 2 minutes. Was rainy got great new umbrellas. But mini bar was not free

title: Club Premier (level 25,26) with harbor view
desc: Booked 2 rooms. Was given club premier rooms on 2 different floors. Premier room have harbor view. Stay xx21 room with better view. The one ending with xx25 didnt have a good view, as the view was blocked by a building. The reception staff would issue one set of card per room. One for accessing the hotel lift (cannot be used to access the room), the other to enter into the room. Hence, if you are staying different floors, you might face with a problem. Would be good to have room cards that can access the lift as well as the room. If not , you might need to call up your friend if he or she is sleeping or taking a shower in the room. Your "lift only" card would not give you access to enter into the room. When it rains in the midnight, you can clearly hear the droplets hitting

title: Excellent Biz Hotel
desc: Was here for 4 nights to attend a conference. Overall service was great. Check in was fast and efficient. I got into my room a little earlier then the said check in timing and managed to get a free later check out. Breakfast was good, but kinda crowded. Location was great a short walk to my office. The express check out was best... drop the keys and off u go.. Hope to be back again.

title: Excellent Service and Awesome Staff!
desc: This is my second time Staying in M Hotel. I would like to express my gratitude and appreciation to all the staff especially Valery for the excellent service. She never failed to amaze me with her professionalism. I was given a twin bed room on my first night. Valery was apologetic when explaining the situation and managed to personally assist me a room change the next day as promise. Good location, near to everywhere. Strongly recommended. Lastly thank you Valery and team for the wonderful stay.

title: Service at the M hotel Anson Rd has improved and so has the food
desc: I stayed here last year in August for a week and we had a few issues but when I returned to spend a week between 01st and 09th June 2019 I was pleasantly surprised. I must say that the service has improved a great deal. The food quality and spread has improved tremendously compared to the last time around and staff courtesy has become outstanding. The hotel has a very good location and the rooms are very well appointed. Will stay here again and again. Only reason I gave a star less is because there is still room for improvement in the room service speed and accuracy otherwise all good.

title: Convenient hotel
desc: The hotel is well maintained and clean,lovely action is very good and friendly staff. Away from the crowd of the city and near to everything . M bar is a nice place to end your long day located on the 9th floor.

title: Ok for one night stay
desc: Pro: 1. location ok; 2. I booked during promotion, so value for money; 3. Free parking Con: 1. staffs obviously treating you like one of the hundreds they due with every day; 2. All the requests I made during booking were ignored: I asked for a queen size bed and was given two twins; I asked for more pillows and none was given. I was not feeling well on that day, so I didn‚Äôt ask to change room; 3. Room is comfortable but obviously dated with aged TV (my dd was like ‚ÄúSG tv station isn‚Äôt HD?‚Äù LOL!) and AC control; 4. Very very tiny pool... It‚Äôs just for a night, so it is ok. Plus it was really economical. I won‚Äôt have pay anything extra for it.

title: Steam boat buffet does not lift up to advertise std
desc: Saw the advertisement $65 steam boat buffet with profret and drunk prawn etc. SPH reward. Subscriber get 40% discount. Sound interesting in a hotel food cannot be so bad. So book a table for 4 on Monday 18/6/19. New to steam boat dinner not sure how it work, manage to get a waitress attention, she ask hv you order we said we no sure how to order. She said we are entitled to choose two different type of stock, so we order chicken stock and collegan stock. Then proceed to pick our food. There was no profret, but they serve jacket fish and shark fish. A cook, cook 2 pcs drunk prawn for each of us but the soup cannot make it. No herb smell or taste very diluted. Failure. Overall buffet spread for steam boat food is not better than the cheap shop outside. Poor quality with the price

title: Average and characterless
desc: Even thought I was upgraded to a premium room, it wasn‚Äôt spacious. In a city that‚Äôs a riot of colour and futuristic architecture finding a hotel that had managed to colour everything beige must count for something. Breakfast is served in reception which feels odd. Although there‚Äôs nothing really wrong with this hotel, there‚Äôs nothing really right with it (aside from the concierge who was very helpful).

title: Where is the service ?
desc: The staff at Mhotel doesn‚Äôt believe in service. Strike 1: when I checked in, there was no smile nor welcome from the staff. After getting my ID and checking the system the response was ‚Äústaying one night?‚Äù I got my key card and was robotically told that breakfast is not included and check out time is 12pm. Strike 2: called for bottle water at 9ish pm the operator on the noted my request. A minute later called me back and asked if it was two bottles of water. Waited half an hour and there was no water. Called operator again and no one picked up for 4 mins. Yes I timed it ! Reminded again on water and asked for 4 bottles instead. No delivery after 20 mins After the 3rd call they finally delivered the water at 11 pm but with only 2bottles of water. If you do not care to

title: Excellent service by receptionist
desc: Was checking hotel rates for my friends coming to sg soon and some enquiries with the counter staff . Met up these 2 friendly counter ladies (Alice and Cindy). Was greeted with great smiles. They are patient when directing me and even make recommendation about their buffet restaurants . Will definitely ask my friends to book the hotel and TOP choice for me for stay vocations.

title: Excellent service!
desc: Thank you M hotel and director of room for the warm welcome to us! Special thanks to manager Ms Lolita for the excellent service of offering us a complimentary access to m club lounge and late check out upon knowing we are celebrating our anniversary and why we choose M hotel was because this is the place that we held our wedding ceremony back on year 2012 and is really meaningful to us. The room are clean and spacious. Thumb up to their excellent service! Definitely will return to M hotel again!

title: Fantastic staycation
desc: Staff were friendly, facilities were great and hotel was strategically located. Was here to attend a cousin's wedding, so it was nice that they treated our large family respectfully. Only trouble was the fact that the card does not give you access to all levels - this was a bit annoying when we tried to see our other family members staying on other floors. Nonetheless, had a great stay.

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: If you are looking for a great hotel to stay in Singapore, you may want to check out M Hotel in Anson St. While the only draw back is its location which is Singapore's CBD and thus a bit far from the usual places frequented by visitors like the Marina Bay area and Orchard Road, a lot of dining facilities abound in the area. You just have to look for them as they are hidden inside the buildings surrounding the hotel. But what totally impressed me is their service robot. Request for amenities and toiletries inclusing bottled water and the robot delivers them to your room. The robot stands at the lobby but it is alazing it knows what floor and which direction of the floor to go to to reach your room. Of course, while I know these can all be programmed, it still fun to get serviced

title: M Hotel - The Buffet
desc: Went for the hotpot buffet at The Buffet on 30/8 where they were featuring the Hokkaido kombu soup base. Food, especially seafood range was very fresh, especially the promfet; and we had great service from the staff! Will be back again for this!

title: Easy going hotel with all facilities
desc: Initially this comes across as a hotel aimed towards business travellers with its foyer and locality. However, the breakfast is great (if you can get it included), its easy to get a taxi or grab, walking distance to Mcdonalds and also the shops at Tanjong Pagar where there are eating joints for the locals and a Fairprice to get groceries. We were also able to walk up to Chinatown and travel to Sentosa easily from there. Our stay was for 3 nights and had experienced issues with the AC so we were offered a room change which although inconvenient (with it being on the last night) it showed the hotel are ready to listen to any concerns. Kids loved the Aura robot who delivers items to your room. Not sure why the hotel is not higher in the Singapore list but that or the negative

title: Great staycay!
desc: Had a wonderful time celebrating my kid's birthday at the Suite! Will definitely recommend to others! Awesome service by GM Helmie & staffs. Room was enormous & comfortable. Good location & easy to get food at that area.

title: Good for 1 night stay, not ideal for kids
desc: I stayed with my family for 2 nights here, we stayed in the family suite, this is a good hotel in a good location, not ideal for young children as there aren't a facilities for kids. I didn't like the attitude of staff working here. For the price I expected more from this hotel and we had to queue up for breakfast as its a small restaurant.

title: Not that great
desc: I found that the hotel is advertising with very stylish rooms - however they seem to be quite outdated. Also - i found the in room dining (breakfast) - which i found very poor. The in - room dining service it not that great either. Overall it‚Äôs not a bad hotel - but it‚Äôs not a good one either.

title: Customer Service very poir
desc: I booked this hotel very last minute as Hong Kong airport was closed due to riot/ protest so travelled from London to Singapore then to Koh Samui. We stayed in Singapore for 3 nights. The website Agoda, sold this room as suitable for 2 adults and 2 children. As we got there it was only a small ‚Äúking size‚Äù. More like a double. We spoke the the receptionist to see whether they could assist and would even pay more for their suite but they were full. When enquired about an extra bed, they wanted to charge an extra $82 per night. That would mean we would be paying more than a 2 rooms at another 4* hotel! They did not offer any help. Putting money aside, the staff we not friendly at all. Not being greeted once on our 3 days stay. Not even a smile. Then when ask for 1 hour late check

title: Good on the whole but a few issues
desc: I stayed for 3 nights on a business trip. The hotel is quite well located for business on the outskirts of the CBD. Positives Reception is slick. The rooms themselves had good work areas and were large for the type of hotel. They were clean and everything worked Negatives It was a bit remote with not much in easy walk, the food choices were not great but from a personal perspective the worst thing was the leisure facilities. They were small, didn't feel clean and the pool is dreadful. I mistakenly tried for a massage in the spa after a long flight and it wasn't what I would expect from this quality of hotel. Be very wary. I have chosen another hotel for my next (longer) stay

title: Meticulous attention to special needs
desc: We were a family of three generations traveling with my father, the 88 year old family patriarch and my 85 year old mother. Given their age, my parents had not traveled a great number of years and were feeling very anxious. Lolita, the Duty Manager made sure that our every need was met, from the wheelchair that my Dad wanted available for my Mom - just in case - to advice on where to go and what to do within a 500 meter radius from the hotel's Anson Road location. My Mom was absolutely delighted with the melon pan and other pastries from the nearby Japanese bakery and kept going back everyday! Needless to say, my folks felt quickly at ease with the hospitality and service that we decided to extend another week. It was the week of the Singapore (Formula 1) Grand Prix and

title: Great location
desc: Good hotel with a great location. Friendly staff and a more than adequat breakfast buffet. Rooms are large and well equiped with shower and tub bathroom. Clean and well maintained and definitivly an adress to go back to.

title: Exceptional staff
desc: Recently traveled to Singapore with elderly and the staff at the M Hotel were very accommodating and helpful. They went above and beyond to help us find a room at peak season (F1) when our trip had an unprecedented extension. My grandparents‚Äô needs were always met and we had a great time. Special thank you to Duty Manager Lolita who really came through for us. The hotel room itself (suite) was gorgeous, clean, comfortable. With 1 extra bed we were able to fit 5pax comfortably.

title: A 5-day trip
desc: The size of the room is large enough and facilities are good, especially about more than 8 sockets in the room and respectively in the two sides of the bed there are electronic sockets, respectively. The bathtub is a little small, which may be the only shortcoming.

title: Best in town
desc: Title says it all, 3000 likes for all the staffs, house keeping, front desk, J Bar. Everything is so perfect during my stay, special shoutout to Robert and the staffs from JBar! You guys are amazingly awesome!

title: Location not good for tourists
desc: We made a mistake of booking this hotel for our stopover in Singapore. It's in CBD so we were bored to death with no way to go. There were small malls around but not for tourist shopping. So to us location is just not suitable. We were upgraded to Club floor but could not use the benefits so it was not that great. Room was nothing special for club floor, very small but it was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was at a restaurant which was too small. We went an hour before last call and we have to queue for a table but not too long. Food varieties were quite good. We find the arrangement of tables at the restaurant for breakfast was very odd considering it is a business hotel. Tables were arranged canteen style and very squashy. Overall service of hotel was great, efficient

title: The Buffet Steamboat Buffet
desc: A regular at this restaurant. Never a disappointment. Price is slightly pricier. Service is prompt and attentive, whereby servers always greet with a smile,especially Amelyn. Good spread of fresh ingredients. Downside, no tomato soup. Will be back again.

title: Buffet . Hotpot
desc: Food and service is second to none. Ameliyn and her team have proven service excellence, Ameliyn as a manager has lead by a great example. The wait staff are attentive and always smiling. The two cooks are helpful and food always well replenish. Will be visiting the buffet again.

title: It‚Äôs a business hotel
desc: This hotel is more suitable for business travelers not leisure, fast pace. Has to line for check in but there‚Äôs no line so it‚Äôs little confusing. Room is clean spacious, we were given high floor which is good as away from traffic noise, pool gym in good size, room has no free water provides. But interesting part is they use Robot to deliver items, tried to call for deliver toothbrush but the service line never have staff to pick up, so no chance to use the robot.. breakfast place is little messy, too many people but lack of staff..

title: Good location and practical
desc: No frills, friendly and efficient. Great location. Room was spacious and clean. Great desk. Toilet room was a good enough not grand. Restaurant was OK but you are spoilt for choices in the sorrounding.

title: Planned my brother‚Äôs ROM at M Hotel and it was the best decision ever!
desc: Kudos to M hotel for the amazing service, from start to end :) special compliments to Sunil and the banquet manager in charge for the 11 Sept ROM! The service made the night extra memorable and special

title: ROM event
desc: Attended a family ROM ceremony. A hotel in CBD area i would say its a gem; it exceeded our expectation. Great decoration for a right event, good local buffet, generous in their servings, hotel staff perform their role with dignity. Impressive! Love their excellent services, their seriousness in ensuring everything in good order. Thumbs up! Keep up the Good work! Indeed a hotel to consider if you are planning an important event

title: Excellent customer service
desc: Very friendly and accomodating by Ms Emily Ang shes very attentive and she always make sure were taking care of. Kudos to the entire team good team work. Loved the choices of food. Absolutely amazing experience.

title: Great stay
desc: What a perfect hotel in the perfect location. We were close to everything and the loft was a definite change. We didn6 get to try the restaurant there but there are so many restaurants beside the hotel and right on the water. We were very close to Chinatown too and we could walk to most everything. Great staff and very clean hotel.

title: M hotel buffet hot pot
desc: Visited the hot pot restaurant again, food was fresh and service was beyond expectation as usual. Team members welcome me and my wife from the entrance until we were seated. Make us feel like Hollywood VIP! Amelyn the manager giving us the VIP treatment as usual, consistently check on us and make us feel like home. She surprised us with her own special sauce to go along with our dinner which brings our dinner to another level as the sauce was so good and to die for . Definitely will be back and recommend to my friends!

title: M-Buffet great hospitality.
desc: Thank you for extending your great hospitality to us during our family dinner. Amelyn you are a gem. From arriving to the restaurant until we finish our dinner and still the hospitality did not stop with Jeremy who came to the table to ask about our dinner and experience. Our family had a great time. And yes, thank you Amelyn for recommending the sauce to go with our food it is perfect. In fact everybody who was attending to us deserve a big THANK YOU. The spread was fresh which is important to us when it comes to steamboat. Variety and quality offered are very good. A well balance. M-Buffet team, Amelyn and Jeremy we are sure to come back for more. Hope to see you all soon again!

title: Clean hotel and friendly staff
desc: Not my first time staying in M Hotel.. check in staff Valery recognised me and greeted me with a big smile.. Decent room spacious, clean with a big and comfortable bed. Love the clean outdoor Swimming pool.. Breakfast at cafe2000 with quite a good selection to choose from but some morning we need to queue for Breakfast.. overall it was a wonderful stay. Thank you again Valery and team for the attention given.. We will be back..

title: Best stay for business
desc: If you are here on a business trip, this is a great place to stay. It is near Tanjong Pagar MRT station (3 streets away). Only problem is, limited restaurants for dinner nearby unless you don't mind McDonald's (2 streets away).

title: Nice hotel
desc: It was our first timing staying in M Hotel, generally the ambience of the hotel was nice with many facilities within and nearby the hotel. Transportation to places around the hotel is also very convenient as the MRT and bus stops are within walking distance of the hotel. When staying in Hotels, the one thing I will always look forward to would definitely be the service provided by the hotel staff. In Particular, front office Valery was very attentive to my needs and made me feel like a valuable and welcomed guest in the hotel. Thank you Valery!

title: Great service
desc: Stayed at M Hotel in a premier room over the weekend for a staycation, the view from 20th Floor was excellent Facilities within the hotel are adequate as well, however, we felt that the size swimming pool was comparably small. I was touched by the service of the staff provided by Valery and the Concierge Wan.

title: Friendly staffs with great services.
desc: I am a hotelier and i was amazed by the services and facilities here.  Location: A few min walk from Tanjong Pagar exit H. Is a business hotel, so will be less crowded if you stay during weekends. If you crave for local delight, you can walk to nearby Location Lau Pat Sat hawker centre at night for satay and seafood or have a Michilin Hainanese chicken rice at Maxwell food centre. There was also many Michilin star restaurants can be found nearby if you take a stroll. Services experience: I was stay in level 28 club room. I was dirturbed by noise from nearby room during midnight. Have a awkwardly chat with hotel guest beside my room while we both open door and searching where the noise coming from during 1am+. Called to reception, a lady from reception politely apologize and

title: Fairly okay hotel
desc: The first impression wasn't the best, the door wasn't working, there was no-one in the door to help you with luggage, couldn't see where the reception was because it looked more like travel agency agents. The receptionist lady was very cold looking with no smile at all. The worst part was we arrived at around 11:00 am and the lady in reception told us that they have free rooms but because check-in starts at 2:00 pm if we wanted then we would need to pay extra $60. I wasn't expecting that since I have stayed in may places before and the main reason for choosing this hotel was because Lau Pau Sat was near. However, we were exploring so we didn't pay and returned later in the afternoon. Breakfast was okay, not many choices but it wasn't bad. Had to find taxi ourself, again

title: A relaxing comfortable stay
desc: We stayed for 2 days in a premier room which was very spacious. as an avid traveler, I usually return to room just for a night's rest. But these rooms were so good that we didn't want to leave the comfort of our room at all. The architecture and the interior designing are well thought out.it is at a very good location for sightseeing. Breakfast buffet featured both Singaporean delicacies and continental dishes.The staff was very courteous. The stay was so relaxing with the quiet atmosphere and watching the seawaves from our window.

title: Great hotel for a small-sized meeting.
desc: Second time there. Good overall, though indeed the (large) buffets get a bit boring. For breakfast rather limited seating capacity. Great sleeping quality. Quite good fitness room. Surprisingly fresh water in pool and in jacuzzi. Friendly and efficient personnel.

title: Birthday Celebration
desc: I had a lovely birthday celebration last night with my family at the Buffet. Special mention to Amelyn and her team who took care of us the whole evening. Amelyn, went above and beyond providing exceptional and hospitable service. Thank you and we will be back!

title: Business visit, four nights
desc: Very spacious room, a bit tired furniture. All you need is in the room, including safe, iron and good ironing board. USB sockets would be a bonus. Excellent room service. Great breakfast, good choice of everything. Located at the far end of Anson road, but this is Singapore you can walk almost everywhere. The only annoying thing was - one night quite a few of my neighbours has left and quite noisy room service stated at 5am

title: Great staycay!
desc: Comfortable and clean room! The size of the room is just nice for the two of us. The seafood bbq at cafe 2000 is really delicious. There is also a bar at level 8 for a great chill-out night with beer and live band!

title: Excellent service
desc: I was very, very impressed. Many thanks to Valerie - the front desk manager - she sorted our booking very efficiently and with her usual charm (we stayed here before). Her team were really helpful and arranged our room with a minimum of fuss; something that could have been quite stressful turned out into a good customer experience.

title: SHORT STAY
desc: I always stay at this hotel for my visits to SINGAPORE. But I could not get rooms for my preferred date(s). Hence I booked else where, but shifted to M HOTEL for part of my stay 21-23rd Nov 2019. This Hotel is located in CBD area, which makes it easier to commute to various meetings. The rooms are clean, food choices are varied, courteous and helpful staff. This is my most preferred hotel in Singapore, even though the price keeps going up all the time

title: Short staycation
desc: Location wise is in the middle of downtown. And looks like most of the guest are there for business trip. Their check in a bit slow but overall experience is good. Room is nice and clean. If you walk abit, you can find 100am mall and eateries there

title: Birthday staycation
desc: Nice, clean spacious room with friendly hotel team members which make my stay hassle-free and relaxing. They even go the extra mile to send a slice of cake to my room for that bday friend. Very sweet and thoughtful of them. Loving my stay there with M hotel.

title: Location
desc: The hotel located in a Good location near Tanjong Pagar Subway. The Concierge help me booked a Maxi cab (for 6 persons). We booked for twin bed but they didn‚Äôt have so they provide King sized bed for us. Good breakfast.

title: Good size, good food and good location!
desc: The Premier room is spacious for big size guests. The food at Cafe 2000 are delicious and many variety to cater to different taste buds. Service from hotel staff is great too! As one of the guest is a big size boy, we requested to top up for an additional single bed. M Hotel provide it to us on complimentary basis! We loved that there is a bath tub as kid loves to use it for a good soak. Just 1 suggestion, we top up for "Ask Alfred" package for our kid and as the Teddy bear had ran out it will be great if some additional chips or even small toy can be substitute for it.

title: Really nice property!
desc: We had a wonderful time at this hotel! The rooms were neat and clean. The hotel was centrally located, within walking distance of Chinatown. There was also a very nice gym and pool area on the 11th floor. The only problem was that the hot tub was not heated.

title: Top Service
desc: We arrival to the hotel after our 16 hours Long flight. When we enter the room it was too small for the 3 of us. After checking with the reception it was my mistake for booking the wrong room but your staff Valery handle the situation professionally. We paid a amount of money to have a bigger room and Valery is kind to add an additional breakfast for us. Will recommend M Hotel.

title: The Stay at M Hotel in Singapore
desc: We spent two days at the hotel. Excellent service by the staff. Knowledgeable of the nearby sites to visit and helpful with directions. Transportation is excellent with options for taxis, Metro trains or buses.

title: Feedback on stay
desc: The hotel is clean and rooms are big & comfortable . The cleaner Rozita was very helpful and efficient . Assessibility via MRT was convenient at Tanjong Pagar station but only the alleys to the station was quiet and look a little unsafe. I would consider to stay again especially for business trips.

title: Staycation with family
desc: Had a staycation at M Hotel with my family. Location is good, central and nearby to my interest of places. Housekeeping staffs were very courteous and friendly. Room and toilet were very clean and spacious.

title: Family Gathering plus Birthday celebration
desc: Have a wonderful New Year Dinner with family in Cafe 2000. Love the service provided by all the staff especially will like to thank Shawn who accommodating my last minute request for arranging a small cake for my nephew. Like the durian in the small glass .... is so Yummy!

title: Wonderful experience!
desc: We stayed for 5 nights in room 2812. Extremely friendly and helpfull staff. Nice room on the Club level that included breakfast in the morning and refreshments in the afternoon. And no children under the age of 12 in the Club lounge. Very quiet and nice. We only had some minor complaints: No separate shower hose. Just the over head shower. And the door to our room wasnt very soundproofed. We where on a quiet level but could clearly hear people passning and talking.

title: Fantastic experience
desc: Our first experience with halal steamboat. Food and services did not disappoint. Choices are fresh and plenty. Additional $9 for imperial collagen soup but it was worth the top-up! Would visit again without a doubt!

title: The Buffet Restaurant
desc: Was here for the Ramadhan special. Plenty of food selection, fresh seafood, food was nice! The deserts selections are unique. My personal favourite is the durian puffs, amazing! Plus point, the chef was very friendly & engaging. Highly recommended!

title: Great place!
desc: Great ambience. Food was amazing. The tom yam soup tasted great. And for desserts, the durian puff was especially delicious. Chef Boz is nice and super friendly. A perfect place to have break fast and would highly recommend it!

title: Papadaud birthday and family iftar
desc: The ambience was great. For family occasion as well couples.. Food is wonderful and variety and spread was fantastic. But overall service was exceptional from the staff and chef Boz. Made my birthday celebration with my family more enjoyable and memorable. Fully recommendable.. 5 stars..

title: Dad‚Äôs Birthday & Iftar
desc: Found out about the restaurant through a friend and made a reservation for the Iftar Buffet. Food spread and restaurant ambience was great. Special shout-out to the team and special thanks to Chef Boz as well! Definitely would recommend The Buffet Restaurant if you‚Äôre looking for a place to celebrate a special occasion. We‚Äôll be back again!

title: Great Halal Steamboat Dinner!
desc: Great Halal restaurant. Nice and cosy atmosphere. Tasty food.. very generous portions too! Highly recommended! Lovely place for gathering with family, colleagues and friends. Friendly staff and very attentive staff.

title: Steamboat Buffet
desc: Value for Money!! Super delicious yummy food. Excellent Service. Highly recommended! Will come and encourage more Muslim to give it a try. Will continue patronising this restaurant and greatly satisfied with the quality of food and service.

title: Iftar session
desc: The restaurant served a scrumptious buffet meal. Customer service was awesome. The chef goes to each and every table to ensure that the customer taste buds are met and also to ensure we enjoyed the meal here. Recommended people to visit here and enjoy buffet with family enjo

title: Wonderful service
desc: The restaurant I visited Cafe 2000, the staff Princess Kay was very helpful & polite. Her service was wonderful. She even offered to explain the different types of tea that the cafe has unlike other staff who wasn't so meticulous in their work. Well done, keep it up !

title: Halal-verified steamboat goodness
desc: Probably the only halal steamboat Ramadan buffet in a Singapore hotel, the spread was satisfying large and fresh. Choose from a selection of four types of broth - Thai Tom Yum, Fiery Mala. Singapore Laksa, and Beauty Collagen (top up of $9 required). We had the Tom Yum and Mala broth and they were a great soup bases for our hungry tummies, but not too picy to cause any tummy aches. We love the meat platter consisting of the Australian Premium Black Angus Beef and NZ Grass-fed Lamb. The seafood platter tasted fresh and yummy. The dessert came in a one-time serving birdcage platter and was enough to satisfy our sweet tooth cravings. If you want more sweets, can always opt for the ice cream. However we wish the ice cream was from a premium type rather than the potong kind of

title: Dinner at The Buffet
desc: The service was awesome,fast and very efficient. The food was of good quality and fresh. Can have a change of different soup bases throughout the dining. Of course the last dessert platter has good amount of variety with their signature durian puffs.

title: Great Food and Service
desc: A Must try, for anyone who loves Chinese steamboat, never selfish in their portion, good service and willing to go the extra mile. will definitely return back here again with friends and family kudos to chef boz and the team

title: Steamboat at The Buffet, M Hotel Singapore
desc: Food was fresh and good spread. Despite being served and not able to help ourselves at the buffet spread, our enjoyment wasn't compromised. Great service and special mention to Fairuz. He's not only attentive and ensure empty plates are cleared, he always ensure drinking cups are top up with water whenever there's no more plates to clear from tables. The overall experience is excellent!!!

title: Streamboat buffet hot pot
desc: Nice place. Good service by Robert. Will recommend Went last Sunday with my group of frd the buffet steamboat the service is excellent food quality is fresh the guy wear in black T shirt Robert very polite n very attentive of service look after our table overall outstanding service will recommended to the buffet steamboat and visit again

title: Great ambience, awesome food options
desc: Great service by Anna & Julie! Food options aplenty. Great ambience, clean and comfortable. Will recommend whenever there is halal buffet provided by the Buffet @ M Hotel. The soup also very nice, attentive ppl attending to us

title: The Buffet
desc: Very satisfied with our dine-in served by Ms Anna. She took initiative to ask how was our food and diligently checked on us despite her being busy attending to other customers. She even checked on us if the soup is spicy and that she would put chicken soup so it won't be so spicy. We truly appreciate her value added service. We felt a personal touch from her service. Will definitely want to dine-in here again! :)

title: Great service staff at M hotel
desc: Attentive, polite and patient service staff, including the interns who were prompt in service. Exceptional service from Ms Anna Tan, who made our dining experience a memorable one with her jovial personality and friendliness.

title: The Buffet Restaurant
desc: We had the newly halal certified steamboat ala carte buffet. Particularly for the collagen soup. The variety is acceptable and we like how the desserts are served in the tier cage. Will likely come again.

title: Dinner at The Buffet Restaurant
desc: Kudos to the staff of The Buffet Restaurant! The new halal steamboat was a great experience and the food simply divine. My family and I are quite picky eaters but we loved everything on the menu; of note are the Kampong Fried Rice, Roti Jala with Chicken Curry, and the Tomyum soup base for the steamboat. Ms. Anna and Ms. Amelyn were extremely attentive and we even had the opportunity to be served by Chef Boz himself. Would we come back just to dine here? Absolutely!

title: Super value for money Buffet and awesome service
desc: Super value for money buffet and I really like the great service here, especially our server Anna. She is super friendly and checks on us most of the time. Love the dessert platter as well! Will be back!

title: dinner @ m hotel the buffet
desc: Well prepared dishes & the tom yum soup broth is pretty good. Excellent service by the waitress, Anna. The most live prawns were definitely very fresh! Yummy. The broth was good but it became a little salty toward the end. Nonetheless good food. Will come again.

title: Excellent halal hotpot buffet
desc: We are delighted to try the halal hotpot buffet at M Hotel. It‚Äôs not common to find a classy hotpot buffet in Singapore which is halal. In fact, this is the first halal hotpot in a hotel setting. It offers 4 different types of stock for the soup base - collagen, laksa, Mala and Tom Yam. We tried the collagen and laksa. Both are very tasty. There is a good selection of seafood and meats as well as vegetables. There are also other starters like roti jala and crab cake with Chili crab sauce. The Nasi goreng kampong is delish! You end yr meal with a selection of beverages, desserts that come in a half bird cage comprising durian puff, cheesecake, chocolate eclair, macha cake, macaroons & chocolate fondue with fruit and marshmallows. You are also offered a selection of Potong

title: Worth the try. Would recommend!
desc: The tomyum and mala broth are one of the best ones i have ever tasted. The seafood is very fresh and the angus beef is good. However, service wise is not very satisfactory. Broth was running low but the staff do not refill automatically. Plates were not cleared immediately. The chef however is very humble and goes around making sure customers are satisfied.

title: Satriyo
desc: It was a nice experience and was so excited to know that M Hotel serve Halal Buffet. My family is happy with the Food as it's really affordable and the portion was very healthy. The Service Staff was Excellent with Engaging & Friendly. The Chef was friendly too and always asked about the food if everything is Good. Totally satisfying. Hopefully M Hotel will continue after Ramadan as is Really Worthy. Thumb Up M Hotel üòÉüòÉüòÉ

title: Not going back
desc: It doesn't look like what I saw in the reviews . When visiting The Buffet halal steamboat. Not attentive service staff and the mixed platter is messy , seafood were no fresh especially flower crab . The meat meets the standard, especially the beef. The herbal prawn tastes okay. The collagen chicken is not rich enough. Do I still have to pay $9?

title: Nice dessert!
desc: Attentive service, food is good! Kudos to Anna for the good service! Dessert is very well made! Love the fondue and durian paste! Soup base is rich and tasty! Love the laksa soup base! Keep up the good work!

title: A relaxing steamboat experience
desc: Nice ambience, food selection is varied and interesting; highly recommended for seafood lovers! Service staff are attentive and very accommodating, in particular Ms. Anna and Julie, and Ms. Princess made sure to check in and see if we needed anything. Hats off to Chef Boz as well; you might not be able to kiss the cook (thanks, Covid) but be sure to shake his hand when he comes to your table! (You can sanitize after with the provided Zappy Boy wipes üòâ)

title: The Buffet
desc: decent attentive service by Anna and awesome service by Nazryn. ultra friendly and friendly head chef to ensure all is well. Nice ambience but i dont understand why must play kpop blackpink songs non stop throughout entire night.

title: Exceptional service!
desc: Came for halal steamboat buffet dinner on a Sat night. Despite being a busy dinner service, chef Boz continuously went round the tables to engage with the dinner crowd, & ensured everything was perfect. Our hostess for the night Nazryn, was extremely professional and proactive. Nazryn ensured everything was perfect. Drinks were topped up proactively, dishes cleared expeditiously and she comfortably engaged in small talks with us, making it a very comfortable and enjoyable dining experience! Will definitely return with friends and family. Thank U Nazryn & Chef Boz for being such a gracious Host & Hostess! Wonderfully yummylicious steamboat with exceptional service!

title: Early Mother‚Äôs day celebration Brunch
desc: Food was good and the service was great, the ambiance is comfortable suitable for adult and children. They were very generous with the serving for the seafood platter. Overall very pleasant experience, would definitely come back to patronise again! :)

title: Cancellation without notice
desc: We booked this hotel for a stay in October and they have just cancelled our booking without a reason or an alternative to their many sister-hotels. It is extremely frustrating of this high-end hotel chain to behave this way. Please reconsider booking with any of their hotels under their brand as they have shown they are not incapable of handling reservations appropriately.

title: Avoid - cancellation without notice
desc: I had booked this hotel In October 2021, prior to the announcement of the dates for the Singapore Grand Prix. Like many others, I have received a cancellation notice from the hotel without a reason in July 2022. The hotel rate has since doubled and my assumption is that my booking has been cancelled in order to seek a higher price from others. This is incredible frustrating as you can imagine as now I am now left without accommodation. Have reached out to the hotel several times without any feedback. Really poor and unreliable.

title: Awesome service experience
desc: Our family has decided for a steamboat gathering & we were glad we found this place located on the second level of M Hotel . Pleasantly surprised by such a nice ambience & fresh ingredients for a decent steamboat . The crew members as well as managers were very attentive & top notch . We were delighted when we were presented with the desserts in a beautiful cage . Definitely we will be back soon :)

title: Great Experience and Service!
desc: Very satisfied with the service and hospitality by the staff who took good care of me during my quarantine stay. The room was clean and spacious and staff was very attentive to my requests and details. Very thankful to the manager and the team for keeping up the prompt service and positive attitude. :)

title: Beautiful Hotel!!Wonderful experience and perfect stay!
desc: Highly recommend hotel stay! Ive spent couple of nights here and I must say everything was amazing & excellence. Beddings were very comfortable and rooms/bathrooms were modern and clean. All the staff is friendly and helpful. Besides, the hotel is surrounded by alot of cafes and restaurants so you have no worry on hunting foods. Giving my 5 star rate to this hotel because they deserve it!

title: Bad Service
desc: Rate 1 star for the bad service . We had family and friends bonding at the steamboat restaurant on 2 October . Not attentive of the service , no clearing of used plate . Restaurant seen not crowded at that night . Luckily food is up to the standard .

title: Pleasant
desc: Great stay at M Hotel ! Thank you for the accommodation, had an anniversary celebration with them and they set up a swan and a cake for our stay! Staffs are also very welcoming, thank you so much! Will definitely come back for stay

title: Wedding banquet and hotel stay
desc: M hotel's sevice is very good, wedding specialist is very quick to respond to queries and very clear & detailed with the information presented. Hotel staff are very courteous and friendly. Chicken pie is awesome. Would stay again :)

title: Great stay
desc: Stayed in a premier room category facing the sea. Room was huge, bed and pillows are comfortable. Room comes with a bathtub to soak in after a long and tiring day. Breakfast at cafe2000 is good. Service staffs were great. Will stay again soon.

title: A quick and fun stay.
desc: We really enjoyed our stay! We felt at home and the consierge ( Ridwan and Lin and Kazim ) did a great job in advising us of things to do and arranging transport. It were Chinese newyear, so transport were scarce. We would definitely be back!!

title: Highly recommend
desc: Visited Mhotel with my husband and we stayed here for a week. The hospitality shown by everyone( Wann, Kazim and others) here was incredible but a special mention of Shariff at the concierge desk is required as he was so helpful and cheerful at all times. The stay was lovely and comfortable for us and well connected to all the areas!

title: Highly recommend for a great stay and pleasant experience :)
desc: We had a pleasant experience at M Hotel that made our wedding celebration truly memorable! We held our wedding dinner at the Banquet Suite and it exceeded our expectations in every way. The food was great, especially the impeccably prepared poached live prawns that were fresh and delicious. This was highly raved by our guests and loved ones. A great shout-out to our dedicated and detail-oriented wedding coordinator, Joey. Her attentiveness, approachability, and meticulous planning greatly contributed to smoothing out our wedding preparations. We are really grateful for her outstanding support! During our two-night stay in the bridal suite, we were delighted by the expansive space and the added luxury of a jacuzzi. The hotel's central and convenient location was enhanced by

title: See You next time! I will back to M Hotel for sure :)
desc: Awesome hotel. Very friendly peoples! Best wishes to Sham - security manager (Thanks for Your Help with my Lost backpack!!! You saved my day!) and Samson - sales manager! Very good breakfast! I love food in Singapore! All the hotel crew is very friendly and helpful! Nice girl bartender at Jbar! Cheers to You :) You are the gem of this hotel ;) awesome job! Rooms are clean and comfortable.

title: Website needs to be updated about status of the hotel.
desc: The room we got was spacious and clean. The buffet breakfast was adequate but can still be improved. My only real disappointments are the gym and spa facilities. The gym is too small and I certainly would not have booked this hitel had I know that the spa facilities would be closed. There was no indication in their website that this was the case.

title: Disappointed
desc: Staff were good but not great I was disappointed with hotel and the club room building work around the hotel so couldn‚Äôt relax by pool the spa was gone and the jacuzzi was not working. The hotel was spotless and room was spacious. I did like you got two items free in laundry every day you were there. Good location for underground and plenty of restaurants around. I just found other hotels in Singapore better especially the club room closed to early and not enough choice but staff in club rooms where amazing and made the lack of choice better.

title: A worry became a joy
desc: It‚Äôs been a long time since I last visited THE BUFFET.Restaurant. Last Wednesday 29/3/2023, my husband & I decided to bring our friends (who is a Malay couple) for steamboat buffet at The BUFFET restaurant since it‚Äôs halal certified. We were extremely worried that they might not like the food. On the contrary, they were very happy with the place & food. There is a wide spread of uncooked food for steamboat & on top of this , there is also a good spread of authentic cooked food to choose. My friends commented that the cooked food were of first quality as it tasted soooo good!!! We had a very enjoyable & memorable time eating, chatting & laughing. BUFFET is definitely a good place to dine in as it offers a wide spread of food,.. cozy ambience & excellent service. A special

title: Impressive Experience
desc: Food was extra-ordinary, service was amazing, Chef Bozz, Amelyn and all the service staff. Exceptional service. Totally highly recommended. went here to break my fast as it was fasting month, a great way indeed to break your fast

title: Will definitely come again
desc: Great service, great food, great ambience! Price is worth it for the variety of food to choose from. Will definitely come again, and recommend to others, great for place for families, friends and dates

title: Halal food at The Buffet
desc: I had dinner at The Buffet at M Hotel. The food was delicious and the staff were very friendly and attentive. Food is all also halal and there is a good variety. I had fun with the hotpot and the dessert was pleasing to the eye.

title: Business Lunch
desc: Variety was ok, there were some hits and some misses on the flavours. The chilli dumplings, cheese baked scallops and satay was good. The rest were average. Dessert selection was good, Mochi was so-so. If you‚Äôre in the area and need something slightly better than the average hawker fare then you can try it.

title: Friday Night Buffet
desc: Friday evening buffet included Lobsters and oysters. The spread was very good and had a mixture of Asian and western dishes. The Durian Pur√©e and the prawns were very tasty. The ribs and the roast beef were very good too. The staff, Anna, Firuz and Princess were especially helpful and made our experience dining at Cafe 2000 very enjoyable.

title: Highly recommended.
desc: Food was extraordinary, service was excellent. Service team was polite, patient and professional with their own task. Breaking fast here truly was a great experience and the ambiance of this whole place was amazingly beautiful. Chef bozz, was welcoming and entertaining towards us. Will highly recommend this delicious buffet to friends & families. Overall was satisfying. Great job to the team!

title: Delicious Halal Food!
desc: Visited The Buffet during Ramadan 2023 and it is wonderful! The is very delicious and would come back again! Shoutout to Emalyn and staff for being attentive to me and my family during the festive period

title: Ramadhan Hotpot Buffet at The Buffet
desc: Went to The Buffet for the Iftar Halal Hotpot. Overall the experience and taste of food is good. The star of the whole meal is the herbal prawn. The staff on duty is helpful and friendly. Will definitely come again.

title: Really great service
desc: Amazing service, the staff went above and beyond to accommodate our family and we were offered multiple room choices. Kazim really made sure we were taken care of! Highly recommend. Very clean and well kept and spacious rooms.

title: Great variety, amazing food and best time!
desc: Truly had the best time at Cafe 2000. Great variety, amazing food and the best company. Service staff were very attentive and helpful too. Really loved the food prepared by the chefs behind the kitchen. Each dish was a true representation of Asian culinary.

title: Very nice weekend gateway
desc: Very nice stay. Everything is perfect. Location, room, cleanliness. Lots of Restaurants near hotel. reception who is Ms Lin and Mr Kazim are very friendly and informatif. bus stop and MRT also close

title: Great Service with a caring attitude
desc: Good food, Great service...Need to mention specifically about Mr.Kazim who came on board quickly to iron out the initial hiccups to make our stay very comfortable. Also a special mention about the housekeeping staff for their service with a smile, especially Mr.Satish. Highly recommended.

title: Comfortable

Their desserts selection were amazing especially their signature durian puff and nyonya kuehs, full of flavour. They had house dipping sauce which includes the sambal belachan buffet. It was a marvellous accompaniments with meat and their flavourful broth. Wait staff (Mr Puteh) were attentive especially the Chef at the shawarma / chendol area. They fulfilled my aunts every whims and fancies. She felt like VIP on her birthday treat. Many thanks to Mrs Yo and MS Emily for the friendliness and attention to details.

title: A+++ experience with M Hotel
desc: The room was standardly exquisite‚Ä¶ what made the experience more fantastic was the service provided by the lounge manager, Roy and his assistant (lady I didn‚Äôt get the name). ‚Ä¶ Roy went way beyond expectations and his smile was just sooo charismatic that always made my day ‚Ä¶. Just one problem: pillows were too hard

title: M. Hotel in Singapore
desc: We spent 4 nights in a two floor room. Good value over price ratio (we were in Singapore during the F1 week). We had refill of water every day (this is a plus). I added the breakfast (20$ per day per person) and it was a good call. The breakfast is international and in front of the pool. Quick and easy check in/out.

title: Great service and love the steamboat!
desc: Celebrated ü•≥ Always love their steamboat here as food are fresh and there is a theme cuisine for the cooked food range. Love this durian pastry dessert today. Service is also great! Thanks for the lovely dining experience!

title: The Buffet Halal Steamboat, 5 stars!
desc: The Buffet halal steamboat was awesome and all the staff were super helpful! Would definitely come again! Fresh ingredients and so much variety from appetizers, main dishes and dessert. Staff even took mint for us for tea!

title: Excellent hotel, great food, conforts bed. Excellent AC
desc: New hotel, excellent location, breakfast buffet very recommended. Very clean. The service is excellent. Suite excellent for family of 4. I use the swimming pool and gym daily. Really quietly. I sleep very well. Bed is conforms and AC work perfect.

title: The Buffet @ M hotel
desc: Service staffs are very friendly. Food variety is just nice. Drinks are nice. Buffets having wide range of food choices. Basic drink like tea or coffee area free flow. However the soft drink free flow are charge at 6SGD.

title: Amazing Buffet at the heart of Singapore
desc: Went on September 15 2023 with my fiance and I have to say, one of the best buffet experience I had in a while. There was a big food spread and the waiters, chef and managers were so attentive to every detail such as replacing utensils and also ensuring that all our needs were taken care of. Amazing amazing amazing

title: Dusty/dirty/old furniture
desc: I went to Singapore for business and I booked this hotel for 2 nights. The first room that I was given was at the 24th floor. The carpet was smelly (dusty) and the room was dirty (i found residues of food on the table and everywhere else). I complained and following my complaints they changed my room (they apparently upgraded me) to the 26th floor. The room was better but still very old and carpet was very smelly again (dusty). I had to sleep with a mask on. I had to ask again the day after to clean the carpet, which they did eventually. The result was I could at least sleep without wearing a mask the night after but this is something a client should not go through. Avoid this place at any cost.

title: review
desc: great food and nice and friendly staff i ate at the cafe 2000. the chef there chef ken was very nice and helpful to customers i had a great time with my family there and loved the variety of food there. very warm and welcoming atmosphere. 10/10 experience, would definitely go back. and i recommend this to people looking for a place to have meals with their family

title: Weekend Staycay
desc: In the heart of CBD area. Mostly for travellers on work. Room has a nice of the PSA. The room was ok. The only thing is during the weekend, the area becomes a dead town. The nearest walkable mall will be 100am mall near tanjong pagar mrt station. Nearby food options are quite limited. You will need to go towards tanjong pagar area. There is a hawker centre and some shop houses eateries there. Free parking provided. Near to harbourfront.

title: The hotel in the financial center
desc: This hotel location is not so far from Tanjong Pagar MRT. The room is large and clean. There are full facilities in a room. Staffs are friendly and service mind. 7-11 and McDonald are not so far from the hotel.

title: Top marks for effort
desc: I feel the M Hotel is a victim of its own success. An outstanding hotel with excellent rooms it's popularity may be the only issue. I was 'on and off' here for over a year and while I could wax lyrical about the rooms, location, staff and breakfasts I still felt it was losing its identity as a business hotel and moving towards 'family resort' Elevators could take 15 minutes with queues, the gym needed refitted and breakfast needed more control over the unruly kids who would pick up food and put it back while their parents sat blissfully,gorging themselves on what they perceived as free food. Is always stick with the chain but 'studio M' would be my next choice.

title: Nice hotel.
desc: Nice decent hotel. Reception staff is very courteous. They ask you if you want smoker or non smoker room. Good wifi speed. My Room was spacious. Complimentary water, tea , coffee sachet. They have locker safe. Restaurant is on 1st floor. Nice big buffet they have.

title: Singapore Holiday
desc: Great service, very friendly staff, lean and comfortable room, location near lots of good food and mrt Thank you Valery for the great service and help to make our stay memorable We will surely be back

title: Nice stay in a hectic city
desc: I was in this hotel in 2004 once and now in 2017. They kept the same quality and it is not easy. Location is good. In walking distance there is few local restaurants, a supermarket to buy grocery and a Mc Donald branch if you really are not into Asian food. Breakfast was decent and staff were friendly. My internet was not good and they gave me 4G router complementary (on basis of returning on departure of course). Over all it is good for business traveler but may not be much of a hot cake for a family leisure traveler.

title: Superb
desc: Hotel lobby and room was so nice. Their staff was all friendly and awesome, restaurant is really good food. We will sure comeback for stay here again. Cleanliness of room nothing to say about, really good.

title: Clean & comfortable business hotel
desc: It is a good hotel for business travelers. The rooms are decent size and comfortable with Hi-Speed Internet access and free usage of hand phone. Very near to MRT station by walking a short distance. There is a bus stand right infront of the hotel lobby. Will consider to stay again on my next visit to Singapore.

title: 2 days trip to Simgapore
desc: The hotel has a great terasse with pool and sun chairs. The rooms are nice and modern but the beds are not wide. The consierge service did not know much about the tourist sites in Singapore. Singapore - all is expensive.

title: 3.5 out of 5
desc: I would rate the hotel 4.5 however I had to deal with being locked out every time I would come back at night. It's so frustrating to have to go down to the lobby every time just to have them reprogram the keys. They seem to have figured out what the problem was on the last day and replaced my key card.

title: Nice experience
desc: We had received the excellent service by cafe 2000 team in m hotel . Even though the restaurant was quite full during breakfast time , they still manage well and take good care of our needs. We leave a good impression by your manager Mr. Alan who arrange the nice table for us and always bring along the warm smiling to us while taking care of our table. We really appreciate the whole entire restaurant team n overall service and food selection was good. Thanks and looking forward to coming back soon!

title: Great Place for Business trips
desc: The location of this hotel is plus. As its located in CBD, every business place you need to visit is nearby. Further to that they serve awesome breakfast. M Club on 28th floor is little bit smaller in size but good place relax after your busy day.

title: Special stay
desc: Room was not ready when we check in at 3pm. Was told room will be ready at 4pm and was given a welcome drink while waiting. But at 4pm room was still not clean. I ask for the manager. Valery who attended to us was very patient and apologetic. She managed to calm us down with her explanation. She invited us for cocktail at the M club. Such a nice gesture. Appreciate her genuine customer service. Thank you Valery for making our stay special.

title: Exceptional experience
