desc: Everything was perfect the moment I stepped in the hotel! The place was lightly scented and makes me feel relaxed. Experience was further enhanced by the courteous and helpful staff who been more sweet ensuring parking in car park and facilitating an early check in. Everything about the hotel was exceptional, and I don't give praise lightly. The room was stylish, roomy, spick and span. Room was well equipped and comfortable. I could go on but suffice it to say I was very pleased with my stay. All respect for Andy who does a great job here, a true sample of excellent hospitality. I am certainly looking forward to the next stay!

title: Thanks!
desc: This is the third month I‚Äôve visited Caf√©2000 for dinner with my colleagues. As usual my team leader made reservations on the eleventh hour and again we were told that we would be seated outside as all the other tables inside had been taken up. The restaurant was just so packed with guests during our previous visits. Upon arrival we were greeted by this lovely lady Soja, with her enduring warm smile. I think she could even recognized some of us from our previous visit as we were being ushered to our reserved tables by some of the other staffs. Soon after that Soja came again and asked if we would like to be seated inside as they were some tables available. It was a pleasant experience dining inside the restaurant for a change. The ambience, music and lighting‚Ä¶ everything was

title: wonderful stay
desc: Had a wonderful stay with a nice pool. Good location near to MRT station, walking distance to Chinatown. Staff are friendly and helpful. Thumb up for Valery who attended to all our requests promptly. We will definately stay again.

title: Nice small hotel feeling
desc: Staff are very accommodating and attentive, felt welcome from the moment I stepped in. Arrived late, stayed at club level. Went to the lounge to have a beer and wrap up mails. The cocktail hours where well passed hence ordered a beer. However they could not serve beer in the lounge at cost after the cocktail hours. A bit surprising and disappointed. Went to the J bar only to find it is more a night club kind of thing, not work place. Returned to the lounge where the staff solved it smoothly, they gave me a beer FOC. Very kind and nice hotel is in a quite and nice location. You can walk anywhere in half an hour, if you're up to walking.

title: Service Excellence
desc: Great hotel to stay, all staff are friendly and always smiling. Rooms are clean and quiet. Thank you Valery for making an effort to make all the arrangement of the rooms on your off day, thank you to the other managers who help her to make our stay enjoyable. Good teamwork and great service. strongly recommended.

title: " Great Hotel,great location great service "
desc: We stay 5 days for holiday ,the room is clean with big bed,big sofa,everything in the room is so clean! but the view not really good is just another hotels building bit of water front. the stuff are very helpful,is very easy to catch MRT or bus or taxi ,5 minute walk to MRT station,if you want to catch the bus just cross the road from hotel,but the restaurant in the hotel not really my taste . You can booked night tour just ask the hotel they will help you! over all is excellent !

title: Excellent Hotel!
desc: Everything is fast, superb service! Rooms are always very clean and orderly, all amenities that you need are there, even small stuff like hangers, irons, glasses. But I just wish they have a bidet or some other similar equipment.

title: Room service
desc: My room was tidy when I first entering it but I waited for an hour for replacing dirty blanket and bed linen at around 11:00 pm and I found small blackish bugs on wooden furniture. Otherwise, staff in the reception and buffet restaurant are good.

title: Good Business, nifty price
desc: If you want to stay for business with not much time to get around then M Hotel is best place. You may want to check this place for best service, just right price & good connectivity. I would certainly recommend M Hotel for the same.

title: Excellent stay in M Hotel.
desc: The staying in the M hotel was very pleasant and enjoyable for us. We liked the location very much. The service people everywhere were very nice and polite. We liked the breakfast and food at L2 The Buffet and L1 Cafe 2000 very much. Everything works well we do not encounter any problem during our stay.

title: Pretty OK
desc: M Hotel is placed conveniently in the commercial business district. The property is a bit older as compared to other options in the area and it shows in the rooms. However, staff is helpful. Breakfast options were good. Particularly, a separate, less crowded space for club members.

title: my stay
desc: Our group stay were just being away from my home comfort. After we left going back to Doha, State of Qatar we talked of our experiences inside the hotel. We have a good breakfast and that's superb but unfortunately the bathroom closet is all we laugh in because the hotel don't have any WC waterspray.

title: Staycation@M Hotel
desc: Booked a room at M Hotel during the National Day holiday. Had a great breakfast and special Crab lunch just for National Day. Nice rooms and friendly service all round. Spend a little more to get a premier Room to get a spacious room and great view of the Harbour!

title: Weekend stay
desc: Booked the hotel w a couple of my friends for a relaxing weekend. The cleanliness of the room was up to expectations and it was spacious too. Smooth check in and check out with minimal waiting time. Had the steamboat buffet at one of their restaurants for dinner, I think In house guests have 30% off ! The hotel is situated near to a mrt station which is great for travelers. The many cafes and popular eateries around the hotel make it a great location too. In room dining seems quite affordable and they have a wide variety, will try it out the next time I'm back! One of the down side is that the pool is quite small. Overall, it was a great experience.

title: Cafe 2000 Feedback
desc: Your staffs Firuz and Sara made our first trip to Cafe 2000 a great one! They were very helpful and create such a pleasant time for my family and I. I would really come back and recommend others for the food and great customer service!

title: After business we test as tourists
desc: It's 9-aug-1965, when Singapore became independent making today 52 the busiest time of the year and Nice and attentive staff, as usual nothing to say about room quality and standing. A little breakfast upgrade helps too. Valery took good care of us as we could on a national day get booking for the famous chilli crab at jumbo on the bsuiest day of the year + a last minute 4 seats for the world acclaimed Kooza show by Cirque du Soleil on the next day. All in 30 minutes, this when you understand the value of an efficient concierge, saved me 3 hours of 24 excluding night time. M hotel just made me look good (and organized with friends and family). I'll be back! Happy 52 birthday Singapore.

title: Excellent well managed hotel
desc: I had a 10 day stay here during a recent business trip to Singapore. My first stay in this hotel and I was pleasantly surprised. Staff were very good and always willing to assist if required. I only ate breakfast(s) at the hotel and the buffet spread was excellent. My room was a deluxe (i think), it was comfortable and clean. Lifts were fast and all worked ;). I would stay here again.

title: Good Customer Service
desc: On 12/8, had dinner in Cafe 2000. Wanted to check out the room. Met DM Rajoo who showed me the newly renovated rooms. Very nice. Rajoo did a great job of showing me around. Very professional and courteous.

title: Very Professionally Managed Hotel
desc: Recently I was in Singapore on a Business trip. Stayed there for 6 nights. Every thing was just perfect. The check in process prompt, staff very cordial and helpful. The room was one of the finest I had experienced. The WoW factor was the mobile device in the room. You can use that device during your stay for local calling, moving around in the city with GPS and above all you can call India from that device. All that for free. I didn't have to use that device as I had Airtel roaming pack on my mobile. But the idea simply amazed me. The location was very good near Tanjong Pagar MRT. 5 star to the hotel.

title: Great staycation experience! :D
desc: We managed to stay in the Suite room. The room was spacious, clean and cozy! We slept so well over the 3D2N that we were there. Our favorite was the jacuzzi tub in the bathroom. :D It made our experience here at M Hotel different compared to other hotels we've been to (and we have been to many!) Service is also great here. Check in was fast and smooth, and staff were helpful with our questions/ needs. We also had access to the M Hotel Club Lounge. The spread of food for breakfast is pretty great- there was a variety to the menu over the 3 days that we were there. Every evening they served pastries and cakes as well! The hotel is also situated near to an MRT Station (Tanjong Pagar), so getting there is quite easy :) Overall a great experience and total value for money. I

title: Service, Food & Quality, Great!!! Experienced at The Buffet, M hotel.
desc: Had a craving for steamboat buffet again. High quality and variety choices of foods provided at the buffet line. As usual, I ordered my favorite soup based, laksa and chicken. My table was served by ms.Yoyo and Ziying, great & warm service provided. Enjoyed everything. I will be back again for sure.

title: Delicious food & Great Service
desc: Came to this steamboat restaurant located at Level 2 for the first time with friends and left with a very good impression be it the food & service here . I would highly recommend people around Singapore to at least try once and experience it yourself . The ingredients for the steamboat were really fresh and I love the live drunken prawn so much ! I had several helping of the prawns along with the homemade sauce offered by the manager on duty . I m really impressed of her personalised service and also the entire crew service on duty . The wide dessert spread were awesome and I like the durian pur√©e so much . I will definitely come back again very soon .

title: comfirtable stay at M Hotel.
desc: Our recent visit to Singapore at M Hotel was great. It was comfortable stay. Rooms were spacious as compared to other similar category hotels with bath tub, beautiful view from the higher floor rooms. They helped us for early check in. Hotel is centrally located and close to all major attractions in Singapore. We would love to stay here again in future.

title: Operator That Made Me Start My Day In Laughter!
desc: Before I went to bed I rang to order a wake up call at 7:30am. At 6:30am I woke up and decided to get on with the day. I called the operator and the following conversation ensued (please read operator voice in a super strong Chinese accent): Me: I would like to cancel my wake up call. Op: What time your wake up call? Me: 7:30 Op: YESSSSSS! Yes it is there. Me: *chuckling* Op: Ooooooh, why you want cancel? Me: Because I am awake Op: I see, ohhhh so, okay okay, I cancel it. Me: *chuckling more* thank you Op: You so welcome, you have beautiful Sunday END She is the PERFECT person to be the morning shift operator. I have never in my life started an early morning at a hotel in laughter like that. She is awesome and the star of the show at M Hotel. The only

title: Delicious buffet food and excellent staffs
desc: Last week patronize your outlet Cafe2000 for a buffet dinner for my family including my elderly mom. Buffet spread was good especially the dessert counter. My 3 year old son was spoilt for choice for the dessert. Not only that, the staff are friendly and nice. Special mention to Wati and Princess, who upon notice that my elderly mom was cold, they offer a cup of warm water and a bowl of the hot dessert. Gestures like this, although small but very meaningful, really warm my heart. Kudos to the management of the hotel who had groomed and instill this kind of simple but warm-hearted service to the staff and than they extend it to the guest. Good Job Guys!

title: GREAT PLACE TO BE.
desc: I recently patronised the J BAR at M Hotel and had a wonderful and enjoyable time. The service staff in particular Bella and Kate are really friendly and hospitable, it would not be as enjoyable a time without them being around. Thank you everyone at J Bar and also the management of M Hotel. See you all soon again.

title: My Stay
desc: I enjoyed my second stay at Hotel M Singapore. The location is very close to bus and MRT station. Within walking distance to my regional office, and quite close to culinary sites and also MBS. The room is clean, the service is excellent, the breakfast is good.

title: A good stay overall
desc: We got upgraded from a Deluxe to a Club room which was great. However, we found the bed to be really small. The bathtub was also smaller in comparison to the standard ones we are used to in hotels. The bathroom could have been a little more spacious. Everything was a tad too compact. Besides these minor issues, the room was really nice and spacious. Service was just lukewarm with the exception of one staff who greeted us at breakfast on both days. He was the only one who was welcoming and nice. Breakfast options could have been varied. Besides the in-house restaurants, there aren‚Äôt any other eateries nearby (or at least from what we could see).

title: Great staycation!
desc: Booked a room at M Hotel over the weekends for a staycation. Room was spacious and the bed was comfortable. All the staff we encountered were friendly, helpful and efficient. Special thanks to Sora, Cindy, Helmmie, Rajoo and Ian for their hospitality. Nothing was too difficult for them. We had a great dinner at The Buffet (steamboat). Food was of good quality and seafood were fresh. We had some drinks at J Bar after dinner. Great ambience at the alfresco area! All in all the stay was great. Will definitely be back! Thank you M Hotel!

title: Luxurious Room, close to office areas, great food..
desc: It was my third visit to Singapore and the hotel was sponsored by my office, which was a stone's throw from the hotel....but the room size simply made me love the hotel...its fantabulous...the rates are definitely on the higher side but its worth the money...Had a corner room and had a wonderful sleep..the internet speed is nice and the Handy Phone amenity was splendid...food quality is great...had a luncheon as well at the hotel... The only drawback is of the location in the night... as its close to business areas, there's nothing much in the late evenings, except for a MacDonald...The hotel is about 15 minutes walk from Tanjong Pagar MRT but Taxi should be preferred for transport...Must stay but only if you have work nearby...

title: Friend wedding
desc: Attended a friends wedding recently where the manager on duty specially arrange porridge for my baby. The manager Fazlie displayed such great customer service culture beyond expectation. Not only was friendly and helpful he is what his company and Singaporeans could be proud off. Really glad the hotel have such great service staff who does all means for the customers. Pleasant encounter who really made my day.

title: Good hotel option in Singapore
desc: It was my first stay at the M Singapore, and it was pretty good experience. Great location, close to the office, and also offers plenty of options for my morning run. The room and the facilities at the hotel are all quite satisfactory as I am not too fussy anyways.

title: Great stay
desc: The Club room additional facilities were worth the extra payment, which was discounted at the time of our stay. A quiet room on floor 26, excellent large bed to ensure a good sleep, and the hotel was well located for us.

title: Excellent service
desc: Amber - staff is so nice and accommodating. I must say that she gave an excellent service as no need to ask for something, she will immediately give and suggests you of better things. I like how she suggested for transfers and all...

title: ants room
desc: Hotel's location very good, dinner buffet at G2000 restaurant very attractive me. Too bad inside my room, due to many many ants, I exchange my room once time, but another room also many many ants, i hate it.

title: Good value
desc: Nice clean rooms. Great executive floor if you can get upgraded. Good breakfast and decent bar for after work. Great location to China town. Staff are very good and attentive and relative easy for taxis.

title: Nice hotel, good value
desc: Nice large room. Clean. Serviced every day. Selection of restaurants. Nice little gym and roof top pool. Team are helpful. Breakfast is good, if a little expensive. Wifi is free but is a little slow in some parts of the hotel.

title: travel with friends
desc: We travel with my friends from shipping company, 1st time in M hotel and i can say WOW service. Valery and Lolita Duty Manager was very great sevice,excellent. This both Duty Manager is really Wow service.

title: first time
desc: We are here with my friends. first time in singapore and this hotel. Food was very good. its a busy hotel and all the staff are excellent and doing their service. guest were all attended. We met duty manager Lolita in the lobby was very attentive and had offered us water in the lobby. Thumbs up to the service of the staff

title: Happy Wedding
desc: Thank you to Kent and Lynette for their excellent service in our wedding. Lynette was our wedding organizer and was very attentive and always contactable with all our queries. On the day of the wedding, Kent took control of the entire banquet service with gusto....from the setting up of the displays to the timings for the walk-ins and service. I was understandably full of nerves but he cracked jokes and eased up tensions, making a banquet event with hardly a dry run run like clockwerk! Thanks once again, to you two for handling my big day. Would definitely recommend these two to other wedding couples. - Best Regards - Marcus & Chiawli

title: Very slow service. Room had strong unpleasant odor
desc: Check in was excruciatingly slow. Staff were friendly, but seemed unaware how long guests were waiting. Never seen a check in take so long. Room had very unpleasant odor. Presume the room had not been used for some time and the fact the window could not be opened, the smell remained for several nights. Had constant issues with the door cards not working in the lifts, requiring a visit every day to get them working again. The list channels were not available and didn't match the guide.

title: Home from Home
desc: The M Hotel is in a great location and able to walk to a number of client meetings. I stay here on a regular basis and the service is exemplified by a poor WiFi in my room instantly remedied by the hotel providing a separate WiFi box for my room, emails never stop! The food and overall hotel amenities are perfect for all my business needs and great value for money if your here on business and just far enough from the madding crowd for peace and quiet to relax Thanks M Hotel

title: Average (at best) Business Hotel
desc: Rooms in Singapore were limited as the F1 was in town and I ended up here. No huge complaints Just that this is a serviceable hotel. You won't rave about it or complain much. Dated and in need of a makeover. The breakfast service is crowded and chaotic. Food just OK. Not near much of interest locally. Support staff not that helpful.

title: A Nice Hotel
desc: Has some flaws like internet range inside the room which in my experience need to go near the window to catch the signal of the hotel's WiFi. But Overall a Nice stay, Good Breakfast Buffet, Nice guest room, Accommodating staff, and Clean Areas

title: Well stay
desc: Convenient, very close to China Town. Metro is only 10 minutes walk away; and there are lots of shop and food stall around. More attention to the swimming pool facilities will be perfect. Good quality overall!

title: good
desc: Neighborhood was conveniently located from the station.The correspondence of the staff was very good, too.Cleaning was careful to the room widely.I coped with this demand willingly.If there is an opportunity, I want to use it again.

title: Company Event at their roof top bar.
desc: Our company arrange a event at JBar and their staff really go to the extra miles for our guests! They are helpful and kind. They were considerate enough to give us a private corner and our event package includes free flow beers and wine! Our guests had a great time there!

title: Great experience
desc: I came to the hotel for a conference and work related purposes. The room was great, clean, spacious, staff were understanding and attentive, and the food was great. It is located near the business district.

title: Feedback
desc: Great room/facilities and location for business trip. Poor service from front office staff, concierge and operators. Staff are lack of experience/interest and product knowledge. Breakfast at the M lounge was good but lack of service and interest from staff, almost no service from staff, not even a greeting from staff members who's on shift...

title: Remarkable Stay
desc: Been a while since I stayed in a hotel in Singapore, shopped around and found M Hotel with a great deal. After reading the reviews, I had to try it. True enough, my arrival experience was positive and I was greeted with smiles through out my stay. Breakfast is a must try!!! Don't miss that...

title: Good hotel in the area
desc: Overall good experience at this hotel. Room was nice and clean. The handy phone provided by hotel was very good and convenient. It was a life saver and helped a lot in booking taxi when I got lost in the middle of night when MRT and Bus stopped their service. The location is not that great for tourists, but Tanjong Pagar MRT is at walking distance.

title: Downtown hotel with decent amenities
desc: Stayed here with family for 3 days. Place is located in Chinatown. It‚Äôs more of a business hotel with location in close proximity to Sentosa island (10 minute drive). Breakfast was decent, with more emphasis on continental menu. Staff was polite and courteous with a very swift and hassle free check in process. We arrived 2 hours prior to their standard check in time and still they were kind enough to provide us with the room ready. They have a swimming pool facility which was well maintained. Interiors were too dull and bedding was comfortable. They also provide you with a handy mobile phone üì± which can be a useful tool but we already had a local sim issued from airport so don‚Äôt fine the need to use it much. Did not get time to eat other meals at the hotel other than

title: Excellent ,Clean ,Modern & Great Vaue especially if you have been to Singapore & know your way around
desc: Clean, Comfortable , center of the Business district but perfect for Families as well - Swimming pool & out door spa area great for kids. Close to local cheap food halls or many upper class bars & Resturants close by. Walking distance to China town, Metro, Hawkers hut,

title: Special thanks to Robert, Cindy, Danbi and Kate
desc: I would like to show my appreciation to the team who supported my function at J-Bar on 22 Sept. Also to the BQT team, Fazile for setting up the photo booth for my team to have photo shoots which they enjoy a lot. Keep up the good work and we will always remember M Hotel.

title: Staycation
desc: It was a nice n simple stay. venue is accessible. buffet breakfast had a good spread with bread, cereal, western and Asian delights. i like that they have Handy for use to access mobile data. very good for tourist

title: good stay
desc: it's my business trip and holiday trip with my family. The hotel's address is very near our company's addr. and can walk to China Town within 15 minutes. The breakfast is very good. Room is very clean.

title: I like the service
desc: Nice service i just ask the location that we wanna go and how to go there ...They find the way and print map with short note for us That was nice! I like the free mobile phone include the internet that can take everywhere that was great!!! I love it

title: Great Trip to Sing
desc: The room is good and comfortable. The food is delicious. Service from the staff really nice and friendly. The most thing to me is viewing from hotel window to Sing seaport... The price is ok. Thank you.

title: Expensive and no service
desc: The room was rather good and regularly cleaned with no issues. However considering the price paid I would have expected a minimum quality of service. There are barely 2 receptionists who are most of the time completely overloaded with customers, barely greet you and just try to expedite the process. The business service is a joke with exorbitant prices for internet/printing/scan use. Laundry service prices are also out of this world. Breakfast buffet was very bad. Such a shame compared to all the good foods you can find in Singapore. Hotel chain also very poor, 3 months later I still havent received any news about points I was supposed to earn for this stay. Hotel area is boring, streets are empty at night as you are at the end of the CBD. No cheap food options nearby.

title: The room was not ready when we arrived at 3:30pm
desc: When I first arrived, front desk clerk told me that my room will be ready at 2pm, so I came back at 3:30, my room was not ready yet. They told me that the room going to take 1 hour to be ready. I don't know why its taking more than 2 hour to get ready.

title: Weekend Getaway
desc: We booked a suite room for a weekend staycation. Checking in and checking out was efficient. The family suite room is very spacious and clean. Beds and pillows were comfortable. The amenities provided in the hotel are great as well. Impeccable services were provided and the staff were very friendly, notably Duty Manager Helmmie and Guest services Manager Andy. Appreciate the great hospitality provided by them! All in all it was a pleasant stay and we will definitely return in the future!

title: Up to standard
desc: Have stay here with my beloved for a short break away from city. First time stay with m hotel which is recommended by my friend and is a good try for us. Thank for the lady how give us a free upgrade to premier room, it look new and with partial of sea view. All the staff are very nice and helpful. Probably will be back for our next trip. Keep it up.

title: Kudos to M hotel
desc: I was at M hotel with my wife attending a wedding dinner. My wife's heels broke when we reached the hotel lobby. We really did not know what to do. Luckily, we met one of your staff Valery who was so kind to borrow her pair of shoes to my wife when my wife told her she is wearing a size 5. This is something we did not expect. Who will ever lend her shoes to a stranger. We kept saying thanks to her but she kept on saying "no worries just enjoy your dinner". After the dinner, we return the shoes to her and told her we are driving so we can manage with no shoes. She immediately gave us a pair of the hotel bedroom slippers to wear and even told my wife to be careful because the floor is slippery. This is definitely a WOW WOW WOW service. The wedding dinner was great. Service was

title: Impeccable service
desc: Went to Cafe 2000 buffet dinner to celebrate one of my colleagues birthday. This is our first time there. Buffet spread was good especially the bbq corner and carving station. Staff was friendly and they work wholeheartedly, always smiling to the guest. Especially to Princess and Sally. Sure to come back and bring my family next time. Good Job!

title: Services that never disappoint
desc: Was back to the hotel again after i paid my first visit few years ago. I would say that it is safe for me to clarify that the services never compromise and never let me down through out my stay with the hotel! As soon as i alight from the taxi, the bellman, Ramdan, had already got my luggage ready beside of my taxi door. As soon as i set foot inside the hotel, Valery, i believe she is one of the manager on duty greeted me and asked me if i need any assistance with my hand carry. The reception is still as sweet as ever. Smooth check-in and check-out, no trouble throughout my stay. I would definitely visit this hotel again!

title: Excellent wedding venue with meticulous staff
desc: We held our wedding lunch at M hotel on 10 Sept and it was a wonderful experience. It was well coordinated and an enjoyable event, both from our guests and our points of view. Although we needed to work with a few catering sales managers, Denise, Jane and Eugene, each handover was smooth and well-coordinated. Special mention to Eugene for being so efficient and responsible despite taking over this portfolio only at the last stretch. The food was delicious, and we received many compliments for the fresh prawns and yummy pork rib dishes. Also, special thanks to Kent. He went over and beyond his duty as a banquet manager, in making us feel as comfortable and be as well presented as possible. He made sure we were well fed and hydrated despite the hectic wedding programme, and even

title: Thumbs up
desc: Good ambience, great food, friendly staff. I went to The Buffet @ M Hotel for steamboat dinner. Reasonably priced, wide selection, the wait staff are warm and friendly especially Amelyn and Zi Yi. Will definitely come back again.

title: High Price‚Äìperformance ratio.
desc: A large and sweet room and breakfast is great. High Price‚Äìperformance ratio. If you plan to city sightseeing by MRT and foot and walk all day, you might feel just a little far from MRT. It's worth to stay.

title: Room was very nice, and met all my needs.
desc: Check-in was easy. Location is not far from train station, I managed to walk there un just 10 minutes. The breakfast was really good and with fresh fruits. Front desk and staff were helpful and friendly, especially Ms. Lolita, she was able to resolved minor issue immediately. I would definitely stay at M Hotel again if I should visit Singapore in the near future, and recommend it to anyone needing a room in the area.

title: Highly recommended staycation venue!
desc: I chose M hotel for a weekend staycation due to their great location in city centre and I was glad with this choice! The service provided from check-in to check-out was superb. The rooms were also cleaner compared to other staycation places I have been to as well. Overall we had a relaxing weekend - highly recommended!

title: Superb location, clean & good food
desc: Great location near tanjong pagar MRT Station, near many restaurants, coffee shop, 7/11, clean property & nice staffs. Mcdonalds is only 1 block away, from tanjong pagar mrt station we can reach to all of singaporean attractions

title: Not a 5 star as rated
desc: Room was ok but small. WiFi was horrible and keeps disconnecting every few seconds. Food was great in Cafe 2000 but its the same food every single day so it gets boring after first few days. Overpriced for the facilities they provide. Good location.

title: Nice location and friendly service
desc: With the long weekend, my family and I wanted a staycation away from the hustle and bussle. M Hotel had a really good offer and we decided to stay there. It was an absolute delight as I had the quickest and friendliest check in. Everyone was just in smiles! Loads of restaurants all around (gave an earlier review to a restaurant nearby). Breakfast was amazing, definite must try!

title: M Hotel Singapore
desc: This is a great hotel and fortunately this is located near to my office, hence it is less than 10 minutes walk. Staffs are friendly and always willing to give a helping hand. The check-in and check-out service is fast and efficient. Breakfast has sufficient selection too!

title: Business Trip
desc: Arrived at the M hotel in the late evening after a long flight and was greeted warmly by concierge staff. Speedy check in as I was so tired of the long journey. Beautiful rooms and a lovely lounge chair to read papers in. Overall good hotel with excellent service!

title: Great Experience at MHotel!
desc: I stayed at mhotel for 2 nights for Business trip and It was a great choice. Employees offer a good service and the room condition was clean and nice . It's in the main area of the city so it's easy to go around Singapore. I find it affordable for what it offers. Especially I met a great Receptionist Sora at the desk who helped me with check in. She was very professional and friendly. She understood my needs very well and helped me out in organised manner. My special Thanks to her and all the other employees who helped me through out my stay in Mhotel. Will definitely visit again if I have chance to visit Singapore.

title: 2 nights for business trip
desc: In Singapore for 2 nights on business. Hotel is conveniently located within walking distance of Capital Tower precinct and Tanjong Pagar Station. Comfortable, bright, clean, and staff made me feel very welcome. Had to leave hotel during peak hour to catch a flight - seeing no cabs were available, hotel attendant helpfully offered to get a taxi for me by an App on his phone. After returning to HKG, I asked for the taxi e-receipt to be forwarded to me - this was a favour the hotel readily agreed to do and executed very efficiently too. I recommend this hotel for business trip.

title: first reviw on M Hotel
desc: My stay at M hotel was 4 ays on September. Very confortable. But during my stay, unfortunately it were rain for two morning. Plese prepare the unblera for Hotel guests for morning walk around Hotel. After 8 AM, restrant was very crowded, especialy Chenese tourtists. Plese manage the breakfirst houre for other ardinal guests.

title: Nice stay
desc: Funky hotel in nice area, just a short walk down the river to Clarke quay. Room very compact, but well designed. Breakfast was a little disappointing. Service was great, all very friendly and helpful. Pool and gym also very pleasant

title: Type of room
desc: I had booked a double bed but was given a twin, Stay was comfitable, staff was courtious. It was my second time with the hotel and I had requested this after my first good experience. Pool / Healh Club are also good but didnot have time for that; will try to make it next time.

title: Everything was perfect!
desc: HOTEL: Extremely comfortable, elegant room interior design and very clean. STAFF: everyone was very friendly and disposal to help in all. Special thanks to Valery, she was the most helpful hotel employee I have ever met. PLACE:Very strategic, short walk to metro, resto and convenient store. I will definitely indorse M Hotel to all my friends and relative.

title: Can be better
desc: Selecting this hotel due to convenient location. Room is clean and tidy. Except that the completely bottle of water were sleeping on the pillow on my bed at the time I check in. Food quality of breakfast is really so so, if you are looking for a quick bite then it's ok. The staff at the front desk is helpful and welcoming, but not for those at the restaurant for breakfast.

title: Excellent dining experience
desc: Had a very satisfying buffet dinner with my parents yesterday at The Buffet. The restaurant was really well-presented and had a wide variety of food. On top of that, the service was impressive. Two servers named Zhi Ying and Jasmine, offered my family a different table as my parents felt that the air condition was too cold. Immediately after doing so, they got us some warm water and hot towels. They were also very attentive and constantly cleared our dirty plates and refilled our soup. We were well-taken care of and had an enjoyable time.

title: Great hotel in great Location.
desc: Very friendly & helpful staff. Feels like a relatively new hotel with good size bedrooms & comfy beds. Big variety for breakfast well worth obtaining in the room rate. Hotel is in a good location close to buses & metro train station. Value for money.

title: First time
desc: accomodation was ok. check in was fast. staff was very accomodating. the rooms are clean. food are delicious. they offer a variety of choices. amenities are well maintained and all appear to be in good condition. Overall, satisfactory stay.

title: Spacious Room
desc: Comfy Bed, Fast Internet Connection, Breakfast Buffet lots of Choices... Elegant Room! Thank you M-Hotel! Excellent service staff from the hotel, staff was very cheerful and attentive especially Lolita, she had been very helpful. Helmie assisted us with our luggage. kanna is always been helpful, will definitely come back in the hotel.

title: Mrs Tiong
desc: My first time in Spore. Check in n check out was quick all staffs were friendly and helpful. Concierge was really a great help for the places to visit. Duty Manager was fast and patient to solve my booking as we were having some problem with the agent. Special thank you to Ms.Valery and team for a great n wonderful stay. We will be back again.

title: A Nice Business Hotel
desc: This hotel is very close to the businesses in Shenton Way, and as such a brilliant place to stay if you have business to do in Singapore. The rooms are large and spacious, and absolutely very quiet regardless of floor. Wifi is fast and reliable and is included. Breakfast is good, server both at base and top floor, however the best breakfast is severed downstairs if you can choose. I have stayed there a couple of times, and I will for sure return.

title: Great experience
desc: My family and me went to cafe 2000 for the buffet dinner last week and we had a pleasant dinner with great customer service, even the Chef took initiative to Chek with us if the food was suitable to our liking. There is this particular Chef Teng that was Super friendly to the elderly especially. We felt so home to be dining in cafe 2000.

title: Service tip topüëçüèª
desc: The room really good and comfortable. The food taste also really good and delicious. Service from the staff really nice and friendly. The price also reasonable and the place also strategic at area Tanjong Pagar.

title: 1st time
desc: Nice and ambience of the room. Hospitable staff in the hotel namely princes and Lolita very accommodating breakfast have a lot of choices.location is very convenient near to mrt and other tourist places. Thank you for the excellent service

title: Great Stay at M Hotel
desc: We (4 of us) recently booked 2 rooms over 2 nights at M Hotel. We were checked-in by Vishalini and checked out by Sora who are both very friendly and professional. The rooms are very clean and big with amenities supplied. Loved the big comfortable bed too. Location of the hotel is excellent, with MRT nearby and excellent food courts within walking distances. We will definitely come back to M Hotel should we visit Singapore in the future. I have no hesitation in recommending M Hotel to my close friends. Thank you M Hotel for the lovely stay and the great friendly service of your staff.

title: Value for money
desc: Reasonable price. Husekeeping service response time was exceptionally fast. Rooms were spacious and clean. Checking in/out time was done in a very minimum waiting time. Breakfast menu varieties can be improve though.

title: Absolutely recommended!
desc: Very nice hotel, clean and located in a quite central location of the city. Very friendly and helpful staff! It is located just minutes from the metro station, in an area provided and about 10 minutes walk from many of the most tourist areas.

title: This has been my second home whenever I am in Singapore on business
desc: the service is excellent, the place is strategically locatdd, the amenities and simply outstanding and the staff are always willing to walk the extra mile. My special thanks and appreciation to : 1. En Zainal - Concierge 2. Ms. Valery - DM 3. En Kamal - Concierge 4. En Helmi - DM 5. En Sharin - Club 6. Ms Shareen - Club 7. Ms Xilin - Club 8. Ms Christine - Club

title: Best Hotel
desc: I am here for a business trip, the service here is excellent. Reception staff and M Club staff all friendly. Concierge staff all helping. cafe food delicious and friendly staff. Room always clean and nice. Overall 5 star services. Many Thanks to Valery and team for an wonderful stay.

title: Average hotel for a low price
desc: Stayed here for 4 nights of a 6 night trip to Singapore because it seemed a good hotel at a good price. However it seems like more of a business themed hotel than a holiday hotel. Location is in the business district in Singapore not ideal having read reviews that said it was a great location I wouldn't of personally said it was a good location for holiday makers. It is not located near anything and the train station is good 10 minutes walk away. Room was good though it had a comfy bed, tv, safe, iron etc however the bathroom wasn't up to scratch it felt very old and dated compared to the rest of the hotel room and it was very small. Breakfast didn't look very nice it seemed more Asian than European so this may suit you but again there was nowhere else to go near the hotel

title: Satisfied stay but few things to note and beware!!
desc: The hotel is in a convenient place, walking distance to &/11, Mc Donalds and Tanjong Pagar station of East West MRT line. Room WiFi is poor and time to time it was switching between hotel's public WiFi and Room WiFi. Also just as you enter the room, you will find 2 water bottles and think it might be the complementary water but be careful it's not, It cost me S$ 16 as it was "Evian" water from the french alps. Not worth paying such an amount for just 2 water bottles and best thing is it's a twin pack and if you open one bottle, you will be charged for 2. There is a small note below the bottle holder saying "Twin Pack SGD 16++" but I didn't see it . The complementary water can be find near the bedside table.

title: Excellent service
desc: its been great staying in the hotel. Was very accomodating specially Lolita. Room was clean amd big.excellent service in the hotel Like the ambience of swimming pool and the gym. We will comeback again maybe next time with my family.

title: Great stay!!!!!
desc: Room is big and roomy. Has a lot of amenities. Had a big bed that was comfortable. Near MRT so easy to get around. Cafe downstairs has a great variety of food. Quiet after the business district shuts down.

title: Great weekend stay!
desc: Stayed at the M Hotel two weeks ago for a break! Excellent room and comfy beds. Managed to have a couple of drinks with friends at J Bar. Lovely ambience with live music and friendly staff. Asked for a late check out and the reception gladly accorded till 2pm. Overall lovely stay and I recommend it to anyone looking for a nice place to take a break.

title: Trip to Sgpore
desc: Sep 3-6 My first time in Singapore. Check in and check out was fast. All staffs were friendly and helpful. Concierge was a great help for the places to visit. Duty manager was fast and patient to solve my booking having some problem with the agent. Thank you Ms Valery and team for making our stay so wonderful. We will be back again.

title: A brilliant place to stay in Singapore
desc: Clean and comfortable rooms with an excellent staff. Every request is dealt with quickly and they do everything possible to make the stay a pleasant one. Would definitely recommend it for both business and leisure trips

title: Lovely Wedding!
desc: Attended a wedding here last month. Nice ambience, service and food! The servers at my table is a young lady but very pleasant and attentive during the wedding. It was all smiles and our table enjoyed the great evening together. Excellent choice for a wedding venue!

title: Convenient location in the CBD
desc: Just a short stay but very good hotel to stay. Convenient location to the Raffles Place business area, and few minutes walk to 7-11, good coffee shops and McDonalds. Room is small but clean, nice views of the sea and city area. Very easy to get taxi too.

title: Nice weekend stay
desc: Looked forward to a weekend in the CBD area, was going through the few options available and found M Hotel with good prices and great reviews on Trip Advisor. Turns out to be a good choice as the service was great! Quick check in and check out and a very yummy breakfast. Swimming pool is nice and a delicious burger from room service. Great weekend choice!

title: Good value for money in Singapore
desc: Stayed at M hotel for two nights and was pleased with the quality of the hotel. It is located outside of the hub of Singapore but central enough to get everywhere under 15 minutes. The bus and train station is within walking distance. There is also a McDonald's and 7-11 a few minutes away. The hotel is tastefully decorated and provides all the amenities, including spa and pool facilities. There is a nice restaurant and cafe in the building. The rooms are larger than the Singapore norm and the bathrooms are a little small. The rooms are equipped with all the extras such as robes and slippers. The staff were friendly and very helpful. The only downside was that the inclusive breakfast did not apply to children. One of the rooms we had was a family room for 2 adults and an

title: Room is not cleaned up when I checked in
desc: When I checked in Oct 25 evening around 10:30 PM, there are tooth brush and tooth paste on the shelves, used slippers on the floor, reading glasses of the previous guests on the table. I am not quite sure whether the hotel change the bed sheets

title: A nite stay
desc: Stayed for a night at the hotel in a Club room. The room seems to be newly refurbished thus it is very new and clean. Amenities given were adequate. Breakfast was taken in the Club Lounge. Variety was not too bad but guess breakfast at the Cafe2000 will be more variety. In all, the stay was rather pleasant. Don't mind going back.

title: Mixed feelings............
desc: I've stayed at the M a couple of times. The rooms are generally good. Beds are comfortable. Staff are respectful and helpful. I'm not struck on the ground-floor restaurant. It's chaotic in the mornings and the food is just okay. I think the M is a little on the expensive side. I think you could find better in Singapore at a lower price.

title: Work trip
desc: I stayed for work. Overall a good experience. Price of items was in line with expectation, however still fairly pricey. Range of menu items was good, and service was generally prompt. One small issue with a missed room service breakfast, however apart from that, good stay

title: A Millennium Hotel
desc: A well maintained Hotel ...can be better and in close proximity to the Business establishments/Tanjong Pagar MRT station. In -House- Cafe 2000 though seems crowded due to the small place but has a lavish breakfast spread. Experience the In-Room dining if you don't want to leave the comforts of your room.

title: PLEASANT STAY AT M HOTEL
desc: The location was good, rooms were clean, in-room amenities were great. Breakfast buffet was good, i just hoped that the in-room dining menu has steak options. Staff was very accommodating. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Feedback
desc: Wonderful experience of staying in the hotel very nice clean room very curteous and cooperative staff outstanding breakfast and very good location would recommend to friends. The facilities at the hotel are amazing but unfortunately we did not have the time to avail all of them.The. handy phone facility was very useful as we could communicate with family members who were staying in another room whenever we were out of the hotel and it also provided full guide of the city

title: a week stay for business
desc: first time in Singapore for business. I think the overall experience is okay. but if I can choose again, I will prefer some non-cbd area. it is too quiet and not supper convenient (in terms of convenient stores and restaurants). room is spacious (compare to Europe), staff are helpful and friendly, breakfast is okay with both east and west option.

title: Just a posh stay!
desc: Arrived here deeply in the night, when no one ever walks on streets, but they still accepted us very kindly and we dropped our bones in the quite small and stylish room. Actually, it is a purely corporate hotel, and so one might want some more space ( which is easy to accomplish if you will remove all these computer desks, office chairs, lamps, excessive furniture etc ) We ( family with three children ) stayed there only two nights and were really happy! It's just how the hotel should look like: all is new, no signs of time, and very rich. The breakfast is truly European with enormous selection of dishes ( either Asian or European ) Add here large and deep swimming pool and you will end up with all you need to survive in long flight layover :-)

title: will choose M hotel next time
desc: I am very satisfied with this reservation, and I will choose M hotel next time. M hotel will walk to Tanjong Pagar subway station for about 10 minutes. The center will go through Tanjong Pagar Plaza, which is the Market & Food Centre. We have not booked a breakfast dinner for the hotel.

title: Great Staff!
desc: Recently, we had our company meeting at the Hotel. The staff there were very helpful. Thank you to Mr Kent who attended to our meeting request and assisted through out the meeting. The food distribution were good. You did a great job Mr Kent. The room choice can be better as we have a big group for the meeting (was selected by different officer).

title: Excellent Experience!!!
desc: We held our wedding banquet and stayed at M Hotel. The experience was excellent from the moment we arrived at the hotel. We felt pampered! Everything was well arranged for us. We did not have to worry about a single thing. We will like to express our heartfelt thanks to the team, especially our Banquet Manager, Kent and Catering Manager, Jane. They have went the extra miles to make sure everything, including the needs of our guests was well taken care of. Our guests have also given us very good feedback of the personalised service provided by the team. Will definitely come back again and recommend M Hotel as a venue for wedding banquet.

title: I only we could turn back time
desc: This Hotel would have been great in 2000 but now its a little tired. Lots of small maintenance issues in the rooms. Club lounge while convenient is pretty poor in terms of service and offering. Bar is Ok with a nice outside area which is good for talking inside when the music is pumping makes it harder. Buffets everywhere if thats what you like - I don't! Pool looks good if your thinking about a treatment in the spa centre don't!

title: Service oriented
desc: During my check in last week. The guest service agent informed me that I hv 2 rooms booking. Which may caused by my connection lack issue, I hv accidentally made 2 bookings. I requested for removal.of that extra booking. But was told it unable to.cancell. I was disappointed n frustrated, then I asked for manager. She was very calm n patient even when I raise my voice. She apologies n explain the booking situation. While she was checking on the booking, she let me rest in my room. Shortly after, she managed to cancel booking but subject to pay 1 night charge instead of the whole stay. She again apologies that this the best she can do. I truly appreciate Ms Valery for her professionalism rendered to me. She is a gem for this prestige hotel.

title: Good location, quiet area
desc: Hotel is located in good location. Tanjong Pagar station is about 5-10 mins walk. There is 24-hr Mcdonalds, 7-11 and supermarket nearby. Very quiet area but you can walk safely in midnight. However, breakfast is not variety, quite boring if you stay more than 2 nights. The room is comfortable but we could hear some noises from outside the room. Shower room is quite small but it is acceptable.

title: Best service
desc: Each time we visit Singapore we will stay in M Hotel. We always come back is because of the service from the staff. Even our children love to stay here. It is like home away from home. Location is good too near to everywhere and only short walk to MRT station. Thank you Ms Valery who is service genuine and the team of M hotel for always making our stay happy. We will come back again.

title: Great service with Memorable hotel experience
desc: This is my second stay at this hotel. Due to the memorable experience the previous time, I am really impressed with the service and everything that the staffs have helped me with. I booked a hotel for a mini birthday celebration for my mum and thanks to the staff Lijun who help me arrange the cake. She has been attentive to all my mum needs as well as being very patient whenever we asked her for help. She has been an awesome help. Kudos to her

title: Generally
desc: I felt generally. High charge is required high service. "Generally " But I was afraid of one thing. There is no ashtray near hotel. Is this depended on law or policy on hotel?? But this is not important thing normally only smokers.

title: Birthday celebration
desc: Celebrated my daughter's birthday just over this weekend. We had a lovely room which was spacious and had a nice design layout! Friendly service from reception, housekeeping and at the cafe. Highly recommend a stay here!!!

title: Special Weekend
desc: After booking for a conference at this hotel, we booked a suite due to it coinciding with our anniversary too and we could not have been happier. The hotel is excellent, the rooms are spacious, clean and very comfortable. This is certainly luxury at its best..

title: Great stay as always
desc: DM Helmmie & Valery are professional and helpful. They have been great ! Been here twice and they never failed to assist me when required. Will be back again. Always a pleasure to be here. Thanks for everything !

title: Excellent Location
desc: I had a business trip to Singapore and my stay was from 23th Oct to 25th Oct, The Hotel location was very wasy to find and overall stay was very comfortable and staff was very supportive. Only part is that I was not able to use the phone in my room to contact Reception. In the end there was no need to contact reception, so it was fine.

title: Nice Location, Good Quality
desc: M Hotel gives me an above average standard of accommodation experience in Singapore, with perfect location within the commercial district. Easy access with fair price, is quite a good choice if you need to stay for a business trip or short visit in Singapore.

title: very good value
desc: I stayed here for business and found the amenities to be very good. The service provided for my meeting room was excellent. With plenty of snacks, tea, coffee and an a full and plenary buffet for lunch. There is also plenty of choice of other places to eat within walking distance of the hotel. I had a club room which overlooked the port and quite spacious although the bathroom was a little small.

title: Great people great service
desc: Went to cafe 2000 a few days back with my significant other. Didnt know where to go n was met with mr shamsuri. He showed around the area n pleasantly surprised that there were lots of fnb outlets n places to see. He got the concierge to arrange for our itenary. Thank you n keep up the good work esp mr shamsuri

title: Short trip
desc: M Hotel on Anson Road is conveniently located near the business district. The 4 day stay there was very comfortable and productive. The food options and fitness facilities were a great bonus. I also got a chance to run around the Anson Road areas in the early morning though it rained a bit. Staff are friendly and courteous. Check out process is very cumbersome so you may want to schedule extra time for it.

title: Busy hotel with a mix of casual and business travellers
desc: Stayed for 2 nights in a Club Room. Room is perfectly set up for a business traveller. Check in and especially check out, is fast and hassle free. Their staff are efficient but impersonal Guests are mainly business and adult travellers. Just a few families so there aren't many kids running around. Buffet breakfast is average with a decent variety. Surrounding area are all office blocks. Need to walk for about 5min to Tanjong Pagar MRT for dinner at a small mall. But the area feels safe to walk at night as the route is well lit and along a busy main road.

title: Helpful reception staff but weaknesses elsewhere
desc: This is a perfectly serviceable and functional hotel in a convenient location. It is modern looking with clean lines and an efficient air. Rooms are adequate, although not luxurious but everything works. Reception staff are very helpful and attentive, so the check in check out experience is good. Main weakness is the breakfast buffet. Much of the hot food is lukewarm. The waiters are not very quick to clear the tables and so dirty plates pile up. And the chef's at the egg and coffee stations are frequently disappearing so that it is not obvious how to find them. A hotel of this class should not let this happen. Bar prices are ridiculous, compared with adjacent bars but that is not uncommon. A few points need addressing to make this a good hotel.

title: excellent
desc: Lobby reception lady has an excellent attitude to lead me item by item detailedly, After in room, there has a trim and quiet environment with excellent view to overlook the dock and ships, I like to stand from window.

title: Excellent service :)
desc: It was my first time to went to Singapore and M hotel was truly the best.Every company‚Äôs greatest assets are there Employees. I would like to commend Ms. Pastor one of the managers in M hotel. She make us feel comfortable and very accommodating. She serves her duties and responsibilities well. We will definitely go back in Singapore and stayed in M Hotel again. Thank you Mam Pastor and the entire hotel Employees for making me and my family a wonderful stay. God Bless!

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: I was at M hotel with 2 others attending Singapore Round Table 3 Charter event. The hotel was booked by our collegues in S'pore and it was way better than expected. Though its not my usual area of stay I found it to be very convenient and not in the heart of the city but close enough for everything. It's got many businesses around and few resturants at the back road and close to cleark quay and street food areas. The staff was very accomodative and helpful. Specially the front desk. I would stay again in this hotel gladly.

title: Excellent hotel for business travellers
desc: I stayed at the M Hotel for two nights in October and it was perfectly convenient. Great location just a few minutes from the business district. The staff were polite and helpful, the room was a great size and had everything I needed. Taxis waiting outside when I needed one. If only most hotels made life this easy!

title: Good location for business trip
desc: Hotel was just ok. It is walking distance from Tanjong Pagar MRT Station. 24hr Mc Donald drive through is just one block away. If you are mostly out and not spending time inside the room then this would be the hotel for you.Nothing above and beyond.

title: Great Stay
desc: Thank You to M Hotel for the wonderful experience. Stayed for a night between 21 oct - 22 oct. Brought my wife and son along as we celebrating our 1st anniversary for a stay-cation. - check in without hassle - information is easy to read / understandable and properly explained with tactful manner - baby cot was awesome !(son got hypnotize with the sleep) - facilities of the room was way more friendlier than expected (ironing/hairdrying/shower gels everything included) - the ambiance of the room was tip top(relaxing) , able to hear the horn of the ship in the morning! nice view at the window while having a coffee seated on the single sofa seat - Friendly housekeeping greets with a smile Just to note that the breakfast buffet some are not halal. But its alright as long got

title: Short Trip.
desc: I come to Singapore at least once a week. Room is big and clean. Concierge staff are helpful. Front office staff so friendly and always smiling. M Club staff make me feel at home. Thank you Valery for the great hospitality always. Good hotel with best service. I will be back again.

title: Appreciation of kindful service
desc: I‚Äôve been here from beginning 2017 and appreciate all of hospitality and respectful services. I strongly recommend. My colleagues are also satisfied for staffs with professionalism and thoughtfulness.

title: Great service
desc: Internet connection in the room was quite improved, so i could keep keep the works in the room. Becasue i had commented about poor internet connection in the room on previous survey, i really satisfy your good hotel's improvement. I feel two inconvinence things, however all others of your service were perfect / wonderful. Reservation's have requested the "Credit Card Authorisation form", i feel uncomportable and inconvinence however my personal menbership and company's contract with your good hotel. And one more thing is poor cleaning condition of dishs at blackfast restrutant, however polite/kindness of staffs. I really satisfy and thanks for your good service except above two things.

title: overall not bad
desc: I was stayed in deluxe room. it is quite expensive but I stay here for a business trip so it's not a problem. in my pov the room quite large, it has working desk and the bathroom has bath up which is really good for relaxing after full day meeting. overall the service and the room is good, only claim for a smell of the bed cover need more attention because it's affected to sleep quality.

title: 1st time
desc: First of all, the front desk manager (Mam Lolita)who entertained me is very accommodating and polite.She gave instruction very clear and became very helpful to me in familiarizing the hotel whereabouts at a very short time.The hotel room is wonderful and illuminated elegantly.The comfort room is very clean.The Wifi service is fantastic.The elevators are sufficient and no overcrowding on the alley observed. The food on Cafe2000 resto was great, there were plenty of dishes and very satisfying..I would love to come back again in the future...

title: Good, but needs little improvements
desc: I had a pleasant stay, except for a couple of days where there was kids making noises and some guest decided to sleep with a high TV volume. Pillows are very fluffy and the staff is very attentive for whatever you need.

title: Nice,clean & comfortable hotel
desc: My niece was having an after-exam celebration at the ballroom so we thought it would be a good idea to stay over for the night. Last minute decision to upgrade our room from Deluxe to Premier Room. No regrets as it was definitely much bigger room & envy of her friends. We chose a higher floor but the view is not that fantastic at the 14th floor as the other tall buildings were partially obstructing the seaport view. Anyway, the breakfast was good with reasonable varieties. Convenient as the hotel was situated 5 minutes from the Tanjong Pagar MRT station (subway). There was a MacDonald's Restaurant nearby & 10 minutes walk to the Amoy Street Food Centre.

title: Needs significant improvement!
desc: 1. Check in was fast. I arrived at 3 pm. No double beds available so was given 2 single beds. 2. No info about gym, where the breakfast will be served was given 3. Room was nice and big and comfortable 4.Room service was average. Chicke satay was good but the club sandwich was below par. Dry and tasteless. 4. I specifically told the receptionist to take all deposit charges when u checked in given i made 2 seperate bookings. However during my 3rd day when i would check out n check in again( same room basically and i went to reception to ask whether I'd be given same room, they said yes). However after i returned from shopping, i got a letter and a voice mail. I took a quick nap n i was called again. I had to come downstairs so that they could take extra deposit. This was

title: Great hotel, Top customer service, good location
desc: I stayed in the M Hotel many years ago, so this was the first time for 6-7 years. Primary reason was location for business. 3 days and central to most meetings. 600M walk to nearest MRT station as well. Secondly, nice hotel, with good breakfast (was extra for normal room). On arrival this time there was an issue with the room (burst pipe) so we had to move to another hotel for the 1st night.These things happen, and the hotel provided taxi to/from the other sister hotel and upgraded us to Exec. Rooms for myself and my colleague as well. This meant use of the Exec lounge for breakfast and also drinks/snacks in the evening inclusive in the room. Good room, only comment was the bathroom was quite small compared to many other SG hotels. Staying again in 1 weeks time for next trip as

title: Cosy stay, great location, they even provide smartphone with data for you!
desc: I really enjoyed my stay in M Hotel. I was there for a business meeting, stayed for 4 nights. The most interesting feature of the hotel was that it provides smartphone with data for every guest, so they can bring them out to explore the city of Singapore. The phone can even make local calls (unlimited) as well international calls to 15 countries (although the connection can be unreliable and unstable - I just opted for Whatsapp call then). The breakfast selection was good, always kept me full and happy at least until lunchtime. But the coffee could have been better in my opinion. Internet is fast, but sometimes was disconnected especially late at night. The location is great - there is a bus stop right in front of the hotel (use the smartphone to check bus schedule) or MRT

title: M Hotel is valuable in many positions
desc: Smart, friendly and helpful staffs from front office, bell room to restaurant service. Quite staying environment, clean inside and out. Stable hot/cool water supply. Comfortable air conditioning and lighting inside the guest room. Situated in good location, close to China Town, sea side, walkable distance to Lau Pa Sat and various food court. Keep up for the excellent work. Thank you to all staff members making the M Hotel a very comfortable home for guest.

title: M hotel is good hotel.
desc: Breakfast, facility in room are good. Quietly, location is comfortable. Good service. I like breakfast at here. Only need to change the new toilet and clean bath room better. If have chance i will come back

title: Nice hotel
desc: Over all nice hotel, I have to wait at Q to payment, due to only staff at reception. Need more staff at reception. One thing I would like to highlight about security deposit. Don't asked security deposit from your customer. Because ......, I think you have to give at least 2 litter mineral water as complementary.

title: Holiday to celebrate 35 years married.
desc: Part of a trip including Dubai and Australia, finishing off in Singapore. Perfect end to our trip! Couldn‚Äôt fault the hotel, service or staff. Bedroom very comfortable. Only had breakfast in hotel one day as wasn‚Äôt included on price, although great choice available we found a place more suited to our needs and a bit cheaper just across from hotel. All in all would stay here again.

title: Well Located
desc: Hotel was within walking distance to Tanjong Pagar MRT. There's a McDonald's and 7-11 nearby too. This was my 2nd time staying in this hotel. I got upgraded on my first visit. But did not get the same upgrade this time. Even so, deluxe room was spacious and very clean too. Will definitely stay here again the next time I visit Singapore.

title: Average and a bit overpriced
desc: The hotel is a typical business hotel, where you would find lots of function rooms and functional FB. The location is OK if you happen to work around here, and also comfortable with walking around to find food. Otherwise. It's quite far away from both Orchard Road or MBS. The staff are average compared to Singapore standard, their English or training could definitely be better. I had incidents where hotel staff addressed me with the wrong gender prefix even though they had my info in the system. The room is old but functional. If the hotel were to renovate anytime soon, the shower area needs looking into. In terms of Cleaning, housekeeping staff misses many spots and trash around the room. I didn't have great sleep here, perhaps because of weird noises, water pipes or whatnot.

title: Surprisingly VERY good 4 star hotel
desc: In fact we did not expect much from this businesslike hotel, in a location surrounded by office buildings but it turned out to be a 15 minute walk to Chinatown!! It is a quiet location during weekends. Rooms are very clean, good bedding. Really efficient staff, excellent food at Caf√© 2000 with al fresco terrace, good live music at J Bar, outdoor pool, small but outdoor ! a functional fitness center and a spa. In fact there is everything a traveller needs when on a trip, whether it is a business or a leasure one. I really like this hotel and believe me, as a frequent traveller, I know what a good 4 star hotel should provide.

title: M hotel review
desc: One of good business hotel in Singapore, located in centre of the downtown and near to Marine bay sands just walking around 15 minutes. Also price is reasonable and quite clean hotel. Also very goo d service.

title: Birthday
desc: Book a room to celebrate my 27th Birthday. Was impressed by the services of the staff of M Hotel. They wishes me and upgraded my room to a king size bed. A piece of cake was delivered to my room in the evening . I really enjoy my Birthday stay at M Hotel

title: Nice stay
desc: Comfortable stay. Nice n clean room. Good breakfast n friendly staff. Check in and check out was fast. Location convenient. Excellent service from all staff. Strongly recommend to whoever need a staycation.

title: Bad Housekeeping and room had wallpaper coming off the wall
desc: First day no housekeeping. When I called around 4:15 to ask about housekeeping I was accused of setting the light to no housekeeping. However they agreed to send someone up to clean the room. It took 40 Minutes before someone came. After that I received a call from front desk asking about housekeeping and was again accused of having set the light to no housekeeping. I do find it strange that their first assumption is to blame the guest. My room also had wallpaper falling of the wall and at 6 PM someone from maintenance came to fix it and he was surprised that the room was already rented again!!! He will come back to tomorrow to fix it. Overall I don't understand how this hotel can maintain such a high rating. I do not recommend to stay here.

title: Very Good Hotel But Can be made EXCELLENT
desc: Very good hotel. Gr8 location. The hotel is recommended to include minimalist breakfast to each resident comprising of: cornflakes + milk, toast, omlette, tea/coffee/hot chocolate/milk. No elaborate stuff. Functional and utilitarian.

title: Impressed.
desc: Stayed here over the weekend with my partner. The hotel seems to extremely busy and yet could still keep up with great services... that explains the title of this review. Breakfast was good and the rooms were in great condition. All the staff be it reception or ths guys standing at the lobby were very friendly and willing to go the extra mile... i hope to be back soon. Set back would probably be the location.. not much to do in the weekend...

title: Very good
desc: I stay here for one night. Breakfast was good hotel very convenient. Near to everywhere the service was excellent staff are all very helpful and friendly especially Valery who is always wearing a smile. Thank you M hotel for a wonderful stay.

title: Good to stay but pricey
desc: The hotel was nice but the mrt is a 10 mins walk and expect that at the exit you need to use stairs with your luggage. Other than this it was still a great hotel. Its only a few stops from differrent tourist attractions.

Room is big, staffs are very helpful and friendly. Location is okay, about 10 minutes away from city area. The only minus point is they do not serve halal food even for breakfast. Would definitely come back again.

title: M Hotel Review
desc: Overall a functional and clean hotel for the corporate traveler. Good size rooms with large desks for working. Breakfast is a tight squeeze with tables in close proximity and self service throughout including tea or coffee.

title: Great Lunch Buffet
desc: Cafe 2000 at M Hotel Singapore provides great lunch buffet with good spread of foods, desserts abd roasted beef and lamb for couples and families. This hotel is at a very convenient location which is Tanjong Pagar MRT Station.

title: Not impressed
desc: The location is good and the room is large. The over priced breakfast was meh. I recommend going for a short walk for breakfast. I had on my reservation that I'm allergic to down. I was told at check in that the room was down free. After I started feeling bad, I checked and the down had not been removed. Nothing special.

title: location
desc: The location is the best on the center of capital area.You can see the harbour view and can walk to business building or take a taxi to there just 5 minute. If you want to look around in the city,right next has Metro station.

title: home away from home
desc: I was astonished that I felt that I never left home. I was able to find my things around and was able to work efficiently. In my short duration, I was so excited that the hotel provided me what I needed.

title: Functional hotel but stay did not feel welcoming
desc: We stayed here for an evening for our wedding anniversary day - and specifically just for a place to spend a night while exploring the town area. Granted that it was just a single night stay, but we were not impressed by the overall experience. The good bits: - Deluxe Double Room is a good size, and can fit an additional bed/baby cot easily. - Complimentary parking - Good location, with the train station a short 5 minutes walk away, and plenty of eating places within easy walking distance. - Good room rates. And the parts that were wanting: - Cool and business-like hotel staff throughout. Whether it was the staff who checked us in, the person issuing the comp parking coupons, the restaurant wait staff - there were no smiles, no warmth, and no greetings. We did not feel that

title: Very nice hotel with a cozy atmosphere and strategically located
desc: Near to Tj Pagar MRT and bus stop just across the street. Fast check-in/out processing. Convinient and clean room with bath tub, quiet to get enough sleep. Nice breakfast and lunch buffet here at Cafe 2000 is awesome.

title: good quality
desc: Nice service and good experience. The check-in and check-out were very convenience. The design is pretty modern and pleasant. Daily mainteanance is really great. Overall, it was great living experience.

title: nicely located business hotel offering pleasant stay
desc: Stayed 4 nights at M hotel. It was the delux room and was quite enough as I was outside, most of the day time. The house keeping was perfect and they refilled everything promptly. The Gym and the swimming pool are not the best but ample for a business hotel like this. The breakfast was included in the booking and it was really good. I used the dine-in room service couple of times for some snacks and the quality was perfect. I felt the pricing for food is on a higher side. You can find 7/11 super market as well as a McDonalds near by the hotel. In around 300m you can find more restaurants as well. There is a bus stop just opposite to the hotel and a MRT station within five minutes walk. So accessibility to other parts of the country is easy. Another superb feature which I loved

title: Great stay at the M Hotel
desc: Had a 2 night trip to Singapore to attend a conference and was pleasantly surprised with the great amenities and the quality of the hotel. Getting a cab/taxi was very convenient and easy. The breakfast location was a little small so when there was a conference in the hotel, the places were filled up very fast.

title: New Years Dinner & Drinks
desc: We had the New Year buffet at Cafe 2000 with an amazing variety of food. There was everything from a carving station, local dishes, salad bar, dessert station (including a chocolate fountain), sushi and a whole roasted lamb on the bbq. The best part, however, was the bbq station that offered everything from big tiger shrimps, lobster and wagyu beef. We had enough beef for the next month but did not want to stop eating. A very big thank you to Chef Boz and our waiter and bartender Ahmad for delivering exceptional service and for making us feel so welcome. Not the first time we have been here and most certainly not the last time either.

title: Good location, comfy rooms, efficient service, all the facilities you'd need.
desc: I stayed for just a couple of nights on a recent business trip and the M Hotel was really very difficult to fault. My room, which was at the lower end of the scale, wasn't enormous but it was definitely spacious enough for two people (although it could, perhaps, have done with a little more wardrobe space). The public areas are perfectly pleasant and, though I didn't actually eat at the hotel's restaurant, when I walked through the food looked extremely good (and the diners looked very pleased with themselves). The breakfast upstairs was fine without being anything special and the service was a little slow and disorganised but not to such a degree that you would feel actually aggrieved. The reception staff were always helpful and friendly. There is WiFi throughout, of

title: Excellent Service and Hospitality
desc: Had a recent stay at M Hotel at Anson Road. Very clean and professional staff and very accommodative. Want to thanked especially Mr Andy the Manager for his personal touch in making our stay memorable and full of satisfaction.

title: Awesome Staycation
desc: Love the room super much... Very nice The location is convenience especially to get food or to shop Eg: Macdonald, 7-11, Lau Pa Sat, Vivo To guest not driving, very easy to travel by bus nearby and nearby MRT The staffs were very very nice, friendly, always smile. Very Sastifying Staycation. Love the room especially! 100%

title: Nice experience..!
desc: I stayed there for 3 days. Pros: Centrally located in heart of the city, well connected, staff is friendly and helpful, swimming pool is without additional charges, well maintained hotel Cons: Minimal vegetarian food.. Best part : They give a mobile phone from hotel to everyone to use with free internet , navigation, international and local calls. No need to spend on internet and phone in city. That's very helpful.

title: Nothing Special
desc: Hotel is getting a bit dated. Rooms have been renovated enough to look okay. Bar fridge was next to useless in keeping drinks cold. Stains on carpet. Breakfast buffet was 95% the same everyday. by 1020 they are already starting to pack it up, even though there is another 10 minutes left. Staff don't seem to care very much. Gym is tiny and average. Pool is small too. Location is great. Close to MRT and a local shipping and food mall. You can get better and newer hotels for the same price

title: Ms
desc: Good location.Central to everywhere. Comfortable n clean rooms. Good breakfast at the cafe. Reception staff friendly n always smiling. Special thanks to Valery who is customer oriented and prompt at service. Strongly recommend, 5 star service

title: A comfortable and convenient place to stay
