desc: I had a very good experience overall. I enjoyed staying at this hotel, which was comfortable and convenient, with very good service. The food was good. The people who were cleaning the rooms were very diligent and polite, and did a good job.

title: Service
desc: Staffs not being responsive to guest's needs. No follow up has been done. Things arranged beforehand was not being delivered. Afterall, hotel stay was still pleasant, location is good and near to town.

title: Good hotel in best location
desc: I had a cool big room. The bathroom was okay. The location is perfect. Singapur CBD, by feet I reached food markets and touristic attractions. Absolutely cool: in my room was a mobile phone offered by the Hotel i was permitted to use for free calls e.g. in Australia and New Zealand and with data. So I was able to move through Singapore without using my mobile data. I felt comfortable and would advice this Hotel again.

title: Good location and room condition
desc: Quite spacious room and roon condition. If you can make a reservation with promotion price, it would be definitely worth and good choice. There is mc donald and seven eleve, starbucks around the hotel and even transportation too. Perfect location.

title: Very good room, so so breakfast
desc: Rooms quite big, good cleanliness, but the breakfast taste is very standard. They provide baby crib for free, unfortunately my room don't have removable shower. Located in CBD, near tanjong pagar MRT station and right in front of a bus station.

title: Mr. Alphonso Augustin
desc: As always, I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at M-hotel as slways. The team here at M-hotel treats each guest as family and as such always ferls like home during my every stay. A home away from home. My special thanks to Sherene, Sharin, Kai, Ellen, Valerie, Wan, En.Zainal, Helmi and Kanna. Keep up the excellent job you all are doing. With a team like this, any organisation would grow from strenght to strenght and this is the case here at M-hotel. My thanks to Ian too.

title: Affordable luxury hotel
desc: We enjoyed our stay in this five-star luxury hotel. It was not the most expensive room in the city, yet it ticked almost all of the luxury boxes. The small pool was appreciated in the heat. The breakfast was varied and sumptuous. I cannot imagine anyone not being satisfied by it. The pub on the 10th floor was a little noisy on Saturday night. There is not much in the immediate area of the hotel, which is situated in a highrise business area. We did appreciate the 24-hour McDonald's nearby though. The hotel is a few hundred metres away from the Tanjung Pagar metro. The metro brings you everywhere, of course, including the Harbourfront just one stop away. A little further and you're at the hawker stalls. You can walk much of this route in air conditioned buildings. In

title: Great tasting in the CBD
desc: Located at the Central Business District of Singapore, M Hotel's Cafe 2000 is reputed for its good food and conducive environment. Hosting wedding banquet at M Hotel is also a breeze. The staff are attentive while the deco is wonderful. However, the food served is the best.

title: Staycay for 1 night
desc: I hope M hotel could improve the quality of the bed and pillows, they were too soft. Size of single bed is very small too. Could not locate the Jacuzzi when the notice for the pool is indicated pool/Jacuzzi.

title: Well located but a bit old
desc: Well located in Singapore for a business trip. The service and staff is really nice as you expect in Asia however the hotel is a bit old and not at the new Asian standards. Breakfast at room could be a bit better.

title: Ok
desc: Not bad, i can hear another guest next door very clear at night, it annoy me.. If the jacuzzi have warm water in it, it would be nice Please add more channel in the tv line, so it will be more entertaining

title: Everything was perfect.
desc: Everything was perfect. The general environment of your hotel is excellent. Your staff has high level of their duty performance. The next time I hope to stay in your hotel again. Thank you very much! See you next time!

title: Delightful stay
desc: We stayed here for 2 nights. Arrived around 11pm and were greeted kindly and professionally by the staff on duty. They were helpful with places to eat traditional hawker style food. The room with a view was excellent, very clean, comfortable bed and amenities spotless.Handy to many cafes and sights either on foot or by public transport. The pool was extra clean and so inviting we had a really great swim and then a lounge around in the shade.Buffet breakfast most delectable.A delightful stay.

title: Very good
desc: Hotel environment and location is excellent. Easy access to public transport and lot of store choice nearby. Good for business and family stay. Convienent to business trip and for group trip due to location.

title: Wonderful Ambience with an Excellent Service
desc: Stayed here for a week and I had one of the most relaxing one with my husband. Rooms are clean and cozy. Staff are amazing and very helpful with special thanks to those who extended an extra mile on their service..Duty Manager Valery who was always there in the lobby to greet and give us recommendations on where to go, Princess and Sarah at the Cafe 2000 for making sure we are always served especially with our coffee every morning during breakfast, as we are coffee addicts. We will surely come back and recommend this hotel to our family and friends who will visit Singapore in the future.

title: Great staycation
desc: A short staycation with my fiance. The room is spacious and its located in the ctr of the city nearby marina and town itself. From my room itself can see the view of the ports. Makes it more beautiful.

title: noise in room
desc: there are loud noises from room next door during night time on the first night lights in room at headboard are too bright cleanliness and staffs are in good quality location is ok, close to office in walking range

title: Good Hotel and great service
desc: Our room with King Bed is spacious and comfortable. The hotel is also very close to the Tanjong Pagar MRT, easy access and convenient to move around. We enjoyed the stay! Thanks to all staff and management.

title: services
desc: it was very good experience and i was satisfied, the food was very good and during lunch the chef did come to meet us and talk. the location of the hotel is near the mrt station, and its about five minute walk. good thing that it is only one change at tanah merah to get to the airport.

title: Looking Great after so many Years
desc: Surprise stay cation with my wife, hotel looks great from my previous stay a decade ago, room is in tip top condition, good level 1 restaurant and breakfast. overall good service from staffs and good view for top level, thanks to front office manager for the upgrade, will be back again!!!

title: Nice Business Hotel
desc: Convenient hotel in city centre, close to everything. Usually this hotel charges higher price at SGP 400/night approximately, for some reason I got two days stay in this hotel at SGD 2224 approx. per night! (Was on Special). Nice room, comfortable bed and all amenities supplied. All staffs are friendly and helpful

title: it's very good hotel
desc: Room is cleaning and quite location is pretty good,but the floor in water closet is slippery Ôºå the wifi is slow and you have no charging line for mobile phone it's a big pity for me.anyway your hotel is very good for me

title: Almost satisfied.
desc: Almost satisfied. The location was good for my business. The front staff did not guide news paper service at the check in time. This must be explained for business guests. The concierge desk was kind when I asked a location.

title: Feels like home
desc: Prime location which is why we chose M Hotel. Lau pat sat is within walking distance. Walking to China town was also a breeze during this time - cooler weather. M hotel feels like home. We will sure be back for future travel.

title: Good Business Hotel
desc: Like what the header suggest, this is a good business hotel, given its prime location next to businesses and will definitely be a perk for businessman on trip to Singapore. Having said that, we chose this hotel as the staycation and we find it to be more than average but less than good in comparison with hotel standard in Singapore. Room was good with all the amenities provided and a mini area with table for business usage or kids drawing in my case. Room was ok in terms of space and was neat and tidy. Come to entertainment, they have a pool and 2 jacuzzi and an indoor gym but i think it is time for some upgrade soon. There is no baby pool and the main pool is small and deep from the start, even at its shallow end. The jacuzzi have black unknown spots in it and not even

title: Enjoyable Stay
desc: A big 'THANK YOU' to the staff of M Hotel which has serve us with their smiles during our stay. We are feeling a sense of home. They are helpful, courteous and attentive. The food and drinks are good too. Cafe 2000's buffet has varieties and is popular as well as the Buffet. M Bar's ambience is nice too. We will be checking in on 30th Dec'17 to 01st Jan'18.

title: I feel at home at the M Hotel Singapore...
desc: From the whole family and me, we would like to wish you all at the M Hotel a great year 2018 full of success and joy. As always we are pleased to stay at the M Hotel and look forward to come back next year. Thank you for all your care and kindness Andy!

title: Well pleased.
desc: Staff at reception ' Vishalrni ' very helpful as was the lobby staff, no problems with early check in... upgrade too 25th floor, very pleasant room, lovely big bathtub. All in all would certainly stay again.

title: Great hotel
desc: I have a pleasent stay with my family at M Hotel for our short trip in singapore. Their staff are friendly, hotel room are clean and comfortable, good location. Overall me and my family very enjoy staying there. Definitely will come back again and it's worth the value.

title: 1st Visit - Recommend
desc: We stayed here for a couple of days as a stopover from Aus to UK. Feeling tired and worn out, this hotel offered everything we needed. The staff were efficient, helpful and diligent. The breakfast was fantastic and varied. Room was spacious, clean, quiet and had a comfortable bed. Great couple of nights rest before carrying on our journey.

title: Well located business hote with a great pool
desc: Well positioned near our Singapore office. Comfortable with a great pool area and an excellent breakfast selection. A solid business hotel. I arrived early from a NZ flight and they provided pool access for the morning until my room was ready. Room service was very prompt for lunch and saved me searching for some food.

title: Great Location and very nice facilities
desc: The hotel is located in a nice area in Singapore, close to Marina Bay, with easy access to the gardens bay and Sentosa and a short walk to chinatown. The hotel has a restaurant at the ground floor which has very rich buffet and nice plates a la carte. Also there are many restaurants a walk distance from the hotel. The room was big enough to have a third small bed for our kid. The breakfast was very nice and the combination of Japanese, chinese and occidental options brings a nice variety in our morning. The spa hotel, offers a nice massage service. The gym is has a good range the equipment and the swim pool area is very nice! I also would like to mention that the staff hotel are very attentive and friendly.

title: almost excellent
desc: Please improve knowledge of operator Staff, no swimming pool attendant , Location too far from mall or hyper market , no information about breakfast rate, Reception ask me to pay $100 for Deposit is it necessary because i have no information about that , and i am using staff rate.

title: M Hotel SG Review
desc: Rooms were very clean and comfortable. Had breakfast there every morning and food was great - not a lot of variety for some selections but some dishes would change and were delicious all the same. Location is excellent and close to our office. The free shuttle service every morning that passes by our office bldg makes it even more convenient. Service is efficient and always available. Was able to rent a mobile during my stay (it came with the room, no additional cost just don't lose it) which was very convenient as my phone was locked to my network provider. Staff is very friendly, attentive and hospitable! Not so far from the airport and accessible. Great hotel! Appreciate how they have anticipated the needs of their guests. Definitely recommended! :)

title: warm service
desc: I am regular here for business, the staff here never fail to welcome me back every time when i come back. Their warm hospitality always make me feel at home. Front desk staff all helpful and friendly, especially Valery who greets me at the lobby whenever she sees me and ask me about my stay without fail. Club staffs are friendly and cheerful, good breakfast at cafe and friendly cafe staff. always happy to be back in M Hotel.

title: Great stuff
desc: Was here on business for a week. All the staff were great and full of smiles... Rooms are a good size with breakfast which is good enough for a quick bite. The area can be very quiet and lonely at night but I guess that's how all business districts are at night... Overall nice ambience and friendly people all around.

title: Hotel amazing but skip the breakfast
desc: Amazing staff (friendly and helpful) in the hotel area, nice rooms, comfortable beds, great pool area. Particularly liked the people in the concierge area. Breakfast food and staff there not so great. It's like the hotel and restaurant are managed by two different people and standards.

title: Dated hotel, could do better
desc: Pro's Convenient location Overall very friendly staff Con's Hotel is dated; everything looks old Bathroom is disproportionately small to the overall room size. Insufficient counter space Housekeeping staff not meticulous enough. A piece of sticker was hanging by door frame when we checked in; and still there through the 4 days of our stay thermostat not working property Tap water runs unreasonably slow Not worthy for the price it charges.

title: Service Genuine
desc: When i came,the room is not ready, I waited for one hour and still not ready. What a bad start of my Bday celebration. My aunt was piss and a manager came to help us. She was so patient and professional even my aunt was already shouting at her. She apologised and give us drinks at the coffee place. She went away for awhile and came back saying the room will be ready in 10 minutes. She was there with us throughout the waiting and keep on apologising for the delayed. She bring us up to the room personally. She includes another breakfast for my Cousin because we are total 3. After awhile a waiter send up with a slice of cake and 2 chicken pie for us. Shortly after the manager call to check if everything is order. Thumb up to Valery who make our stay from being disappointed to a

title: A pleasant stay for business travelers.
desc: The facilities, environment and services are excellent here. The room is clean and amenities are well refilled everyday. The location is a bit far from choices of restaurants and shops. Only 1 minimart nearby. However, there are other minimarts in walking distance.

title: Fairly Nice Hotel
desc: Been there for 3 days between 10 and 12 January 2018. Staff at the lobby are very quick, tactful and deliver to your request soonest. Special note to staff named Ramdan, he was there to greet me and took care of my luggage when I arrived midnight. Excellent work, R. Electricity plug in the room which they so called cater all international plug did't work on the working table, use the bedside ones instead. On the Jan 11th when I came back to the hotel, to my surprise my room wasn't clean yet, i asked the housekeeping lady who happened to pass i front of my room to clean..(weird enough since I left hotel from 730AM).. room was cleaned okay, however I can noticed that my bed sheet wasnt changed despite the request. But overall room hygiene is good.

title: Great Service!!
desc: Stayed here on a business trip as my office was nearby. Room was big and spacious especially for a hotel in Singapore. Check in was smooth and staff was friendly generally. M Club lounge was excellent. I would like to thank Sharen (who I assume is the manager there) for taking care of me throughout my stay. Never failed to greet me by name and remembers what my preferences. Truly a man of hospitality.

title: Disappointing M club room
desc: At first I had a good impression of this hotel because there was special breakfast served upstairs on level 28 and complimentary cocktail hours from 6-8 (which I missed on the first night because I didn‚Äôt know it) but after checking in our room I‚Äôm just very disappointed. We paid over $200+ per night - for two nights for the m club room. The bathroom have dead insects on the bathtub and toilet floor.. very disgusting. And the bed and pillow have several hair and a lot of dust on it. It seems like this room wasn‚Äôt cleaned properly and nobody have lived here for a long time. We actually wanted to come back here for our future Singapore trips as we frequently come here.. I don‚Äôt know anymore. Requested to get our bed changed but they offered to change rooms.. okay cool.

title: Thank you!
desc: Stayed here last week with my family using the ala carte voucher. I requested a sea view room and the receptionist by the name Sharen happily upgraded our room to a premier room! The room was big and spacious with a king size bed. My wife and son was happy with the room and the view was nice, overlooking the port and sea. Didn't manage to see him upon check out but thank you Sharen for the upgrade. You made our stay more enjoyable

title: Good enough for now
desc: Overall, a convenient property and location, cleanliness with bathe towels could have been just that little better. Also, for guests who are members of the hotel, it would have been great to have a welcome basket and the use of the club floor as an upgrade.

title: Average in good location
desc: Stayed here over the weekend with friends. Hotel is situated in good location, with fast food, 7-11 and MRT close by. Wifi signal is excellent and fast through out the hotel. Room is slightly dirty with hairs around desk and floor upon check in.

title: good serivce
desc: I stayed this hotel for holiday with my friend and it was really great hotel for the vacation. All the staff was friendly and nice! Especially Special thanks to SORA , she has great smile for her service. Also RAJOO and VALERY ( manager i guess) thanks to giving us for the late check out. RAMDAN from bell counter he was helping a lot for the information. Thank you!!

title: Great Hotel
desc: Had a good two day stay during my last trip to Singapore. Service by all staff was good and attentive. The breakfast was ok - it could have had a little more choice. The automated egg station was also interesting.

title: Overall is good
desc: Overall is good, but our bathroom had some problem, water were dropped from upper room guest. No any staff assist us, just offer room changed 30 minutes later. Only extend check out from 3-5 for compensate

title: Thumb up service
desc: I would like thanks Jasmine & one more lady for her excellent service and their attentive to our table during our CNY company department on 16 February 2018. During their peak period, they have been providing us a good service and kept checking on our table to ensure cleanliness and replenish soup and plain water to ensure we are good. On top of that, they are aware that we are there for birthday celebration too and they have arranged chicken pie for my colleague. This is really touched. We are appreciated that they are being so thoughtful. Thank you so much as we had enjoyed so much during our steamboat at there.

title: Fancy room but lacking in all other ways
desc: We stayed at M Hotel over Chinese New Year for a short family staycation with our child. We managed to book a club room and assumed we would get better than the usual service from the hotel staff. Instead, our experience was awful. The club room was managed by two male staff on shifts and neither was helpful. At one point, one of them was sleeping at his desk. When we asked for help with the coffee machine or food, we were treated like an annoyance and responses were glib and impolite. We couldn't believe that the hotel would hire guys like this to manage a club rooms floor, which requires etiquette, exceptional service and attention to every guest over and above the usual service that any hotel ought to provide. Other minus points: this hotel is located in a segment of the

title: Don't go there !
desc: Be careful, this is not Hotel G, W Hotel, or M Social... this is only M Hotel Location is very poor, at the far end of financial district. They attract you with high discount proposed on all travel websites, but when you realised that you made a mistake by booking here, there is no way to cancel and they immediately cash in the FULL booking cost (not even part of it). Scammers !!!

title: Money gone from my card!
desc: My room has been booked and paid by American Express, but hotel staff demanded my credit card. As they said money amount will be only hold on my account, in fact money has been withdrawn for 2 days of hotel stay instead of one!! And I had to stay in Singapore with 40$ only...

title: Very good
desc: We were only in Singapore for 2 days and the hotel was perfect it in walking distance of the MRT. The staff were very helpful and the rooms were spotlessly clean. We had coffee and cake in the foyer which was very good.

title: Nice place,nice room,and nice people,and the people who works there is very make me comffortable like home
desc: I stay there for two days on my bussiness trip..they are very helpfull and humble,the room is very nice too,the food is great too with a lot of menu like european menu and asian menu,maybe if go to singapore again i will stay at this hotel again..nice hotel,nice people

title: Its OK but you can do better in SG
desc: Rooms are OK but the breakfast area was just chaos. Too many tables in a small area trying to accommodate a large number of guests. As such staff are hassled and don't offer much in terms of service. Breakfast set up to create a canteen style long queue if you bothered to try and get hot food. Mugs of coffee poured in advance and left out for guests to pick up. Overall not the best atmosphere for starting the day

title: Great stay
desc: Stay there again for business... i guess i have been there too many times and it feels like home where everybody remembers me and all of my preferences. Reception as usual is swift and friendly. Ths bar at level 9 is also great. Has an outdoor feel to it peferct for a beer before calling it a day.... I will be back again for sure.. thank u to the team at M hotel for making it my second home

title: Nice hotel
desc: Stayed at the M Hotel for 4 nights when in town on business. Extremely convenient location in the financial district, very close to my meeting location. Room was spacious and clean, included a buffet breakfast which had a good selection and was quite tasty. We also had a drink at the J Bar which was nice. Happy hour ended at 8pm; ordered a drink at 8:02 pm and had to pay the regular price which seemed a bit ridiculous seeing as we had already had one drink. When I asked about it, they blamed it on the computer. Not a huge deal but seems they could have exercised judgment and given us the better Price. The best staff in the hotel were the bellmen who were very helpful, particularly when we needed transportation. One waiter in the bar on the main floor was also

title: Nice hotel.
desc: This hotel is located in the financial center of Singapore. I think all the rooms have breakfast included which is a nice addition otherwise they charge $30 for breakfast. If you need to use the local Metro the subway station closest by it's about a 5 to 10 minute walk. Chinatown is about 25 or 30 minute walk if you're interested to see that and most else in the downtown probably requires a transit or ride of some kind to get there. The hotel is comfortable. The rooms a bit small and you can hear your neighbours through the walls somewhat.  Nice showers. Beds were firm but comfy. Single beds. Loved the complimentary cell phone they give you to take around in Singapore. Internet everywhere you go and calls. Nice to use the maps feature and look up things while you are on the go.

title: Pleasant Stay
desc: Thanks to Clarice for providing a swift and pleasant check-in and check-out experience. Thank you to Emelyn, restaurant manager at The Buffet for her attentiveness. Will definitely recommend my friends here for staycation and the food!

title: Good
desc: Hotel nice decoration. Lighting in hotel and room all good. Big room with clean and comfortable bed. Breakfast many choices and taste good. Walking to train station and bus stop near. Beside have many places to eat. Nice hotel with friendly staff.

title: Great staycation
desc: Staycation for a friend Birthday celebration. The room big and clean. Lobby with nice decoration. We didn't manage to get our room earlier but we are still very happy with the service of the hotel. Staff surprised us with a piece of Birthday cake and allow us an hour extra late check out. Thank you M Hotel.

title: Value for the money
desc: 100% value for the pay. Very friendly staff beautiful well maintained rooms I stay only two nights but very recently again I come with my family hotel located in the city Chinatown No boring at all food also fantastic

title: Good location
desc: Good and convenient location short walk to train station. Many shops around the hotel. Hotel staff friendly and helpful. Hotel provide mobile in room for guest to use. We will stay this hotel again if come back Singapore.

title: Staycation at m hotel
desc: So far the stay was not bad, was giving free upgrade to suite due to some misunderstanding during the reservation time. Overall they provide a service recovery with good effort . Think I will still come back if the price is still so reasonable .

title: Good
desc: This hotel is good place, comfortable and all stall is very nice, this place near China Town , I can to shopping and near my office in Shenton way road. For the next time I think I will come here again.

title: Business trip
desc: Came here for business trip, convenient hotel, walking distance to office, near to many places of interest. Quiet hotels with good service from all staff. Cafe serve delicious food. Strongly recommend

title: Excellent
desc: Thumb up to team of M Hotel for making our stay a memorable experience. Good customer service from all the staff. They are helpful and friendly. The buffet hotpot serve delicious 'steamboat' with so many kind of meat and seafood. We will definitely be back.

title: Service good
desc: Was here for a week for business trip. Good Location near to office and many places. Staff is always helpful and friendly. Always smile to me and talk to me. Good service hotel. Will come back if git CE back Singapore again.

title: Excellent service provided
desc: A nice hotel for family staycation! Requested for extra bed and it was neatly set up. Helmi, Lolita and Valery were extremely friendly and helpful, went the extra mile to make the stay pleasant. A surprise dessert was also placed in the room as it was my birthday. We felt very welcome and touched. Thank you!

title: Holiday
desc: Hotel near to Chinatown only walking to train station. Big, clean and nice room. Breakfast room many people and many good food. Staff at the check in and check in always smiling and helpful. Happy to stay on M hotel.

title: Quiet
desc: Stayed in M Hotel when I was here for a business trip. The hotel is near to the subway convenient to go to office and many other places. Hotel is quiet at night and on weekends. Employees are all helpful, housekeeping staff are friendly too. M Hotel is a nice hotel to stay. I will come back and stay again.

title: Good quality business hotel, nothing too much trouble
desc: From check-in to check-out, and an unusual request in between, my stay at the M Hotel in Singapore was very good. Nothing seemed to be too much trouble for the people working here. Realising I had forgotten to pack cufflinks, and it being too late to buy some, the Concierge managed to rustle some up, with an apology there was a slight imperfection in one of the cufflinks. I was so grateful he was able to lend me a set as I had to present at a conference. My room, 2021, was large and comfortable, with good air conditioning, a must in Singapore. The free wifi was fast and reliable. The in-house gym, without a rowing machine (damn), was well equipped. Breakfast was ok, with Western and Oriental options, and could be improved with a better choice of tea.OK this last point is

title: Great 3 day Stopover
desc: Spent 3 days here over a weekend and the hotel came up to expectations. We had two rooms and had no problems whatsoever. The concierge staff were brilliant and are a credit to the hotel. The rooms were very good and everything you required was there. The breakfast was excellent and plentiful. In fact there was so much choice we did not need to eat again until the evening. Centrally located and walking distance to MTR and buses and taxis right outside hotel. Good pool and fitness room and plenty of lifts to accommodate the many hotel guests. Definitely recommend this hotel and would stay again if in town.

title: Surprise
desc: First impression was great, from the door way tobtge reception counter i was greeted by every staff that sees me, i was given a late checknout at 2pm when the receptionist realise it was my birthday. In the evening, a piece of cake was deliver to my room. Thank you M Hotel

title: Wedding at M hotel
desc: M hotel is a nice and cosy hotel for wedding, the room are nice and staffs are friendly. I would like to thanks Akita and Kent, especially to Akita she really has tons of patience with us. I Will definitely recommend to my friends

title: Short Business trip with great 1-night stay
desc: This was the 1st time for my stay on Anson Rd., which is one of business district in SG. It took around 30 min. from Changi airport by cab. Quite convenient for business trip or personal travel. I arrived the hotel around 3:30 PM and checked in immediately. Very quick/ professional greeting from front desk (only 15 min.) My room was deluxe type, located on 14th fl. facing to Anson Rd. Another side of room faces to Tanjong pagar Terminal. Deluxe type room is 29 Sqm / 312 Sq Ft suiting 2 guests comfortably. - I was impressed with the cleanness of bed preparation, carpet, bathroom. Maybe the hotel condition is quite new. (not sure when it was opened.) Additionally there is mobile tool (look like iphone) provided on working desk for searching hotel info., interesting places, and

title: Recommend
desc: A great place to stay in the city! Recommend this hotel for staycations! Room is clean and spacious. Especially the toilet! Bed was comfy amd the whole ambience is calm and relaxing. Our room window faces the buildings along anson street so there isn't much view outside. However, internet access is quite difficult as there was some issues when keying in the userid and password.

title: Convinient location, great value , near MRT and McDonald‚Äôs
desc: Convinient location, great value , near MRT and McDonald‚Äôs. Pool was ok. Breakfast was awesome. Rooms are spacious. Nice area, in financial district, gets quiet at night and weekends. Close to MRT tanjon pagar which is a quick Link to a lot of things to do in Singapore.

title: The stay in M Hotel
desc: We like the family suit actually when we first book the hotel but it turn out that we cannot enjoy the facilities inside the room at all. Would like to suggest that to remove the moden inside the room which is very disturbing about the blinking light and remove the camera which will lead to misunderstanding from the customers. Overall, the hotel location is great and the breakfast is nice too.

title: Convenient location. Modern design.Good for business travellers.
desc: Staying here is ideal if you want to be within walking distance to CBD, the train(MTR), bars and restaurants. The hotel has good facilities, decent room size, modern furnishing compared to others at the room's price range. It even has a complimentary android phone for travellers who do not want to pay for data roaming or can be bothered to get a local sim for data. Wifi service is good. Room service for food is good as well, you don't have to wait an hour for food, I do appreciate how the food is served and the person delivering it aimed to please. My room had modern furniture conducive for working as well. The gentlemen by the back entrance are very helpful with requests for a cab and directions even. The night shift receptionist is snooty and could use an attitude change, also

title: Close to my office
desc: The room is big and nice. Washroom is abit obsolete. Breakfast there is just so so. Location is indeed good. Besides it‚Äôs close to my office, it‚Äôs easy to just walk around to seek for food and supermarket.

title: Beautiful Hotel
desc: First night in Singapore after a 12 hour flight. Night to stay in a comfy room with a nice bed. View from the 30th floor is great and breakfast the next morning at the 29th even better. The only little thing I didn't like so much was the mold in the sink. Iehwl. But we slept very good and breakfast was good!

title: Great hotel
desc: Located at a very convenient location. 7-11 just right across the street and 24-hr McDonald's. Can never go wrong with McDonald's. Staff are friendly and warm. Very efficient. Check in took less than 5mins. Rooms are clean and big for Singapore standard. Highly recommended.

title: Excellent
desc: M Hotel is near the city centre, MRT station and Bus stop is near the hotel. Rooms are big and clean. Cafe serve nice food but a little too expensive. Overall a wonderful stay. Thank you M Hotel. Strongly recommend.

title: Great Stay
desc: I had a great time staying at the M Hotel, I booked the Premier Room for a mini staycation on my birthday and was pleased to find a clean and comfortable room. It's a nice place to stay over the weekend if you would like to feel refreshed. I was surprised with a cake on my birthday by the hotel and was touched by the thoughtfulness of the hotel staff.

title: Sub par hotel
desc: We spent one night in the hotel and wasn't impressed with it at all. I booked the room via Expedia for 2 adults but they claimed it was for 1 adult and the restaurant wanted to charge extra for breakfast. Luckily I showed my booking to front desk and they rectified their mistake. The buffet breakfast wasn't that great, and I definitely wouldn't have paid $38++ for it. Not a wide spread and the food was just meh. The tv stations were unclear in quality and had very limited channels (which hotel shows Malaysian channels anymore??) compared to other hotels. 1 movie (unclear quality) channel, 1 cartoon channel, some news channels and the rest were local channels. The toilet had problems flushing but we didn't bother to inform the staff as they didn't seem very friendly. The

title: Central business hotel
desc: I stayed four nights. I liked the spacious room and the big desk, very useful to use the pc. Breakfast is nice, even if there could be some fresh made pancakes or eggs (are available but in the buffet). Clean and professional service.

title: Like the size of the room
desc: We arrived at 11 am & check in time was around 3pm. They will check us in if i pay Sgd35 & i agreed to it bec we were on the early flight & didnt have much sleep. The room is quite spacious & so is the bathroom. The shower & bath tub were separated which is actually good too. The hotel is near a NTC supermarket & so near many restos as well. We were able to enjoy some fruits in a local market open 24 hours near Carlton city. I was on the hunt to eat durian but it was only available after 6pm. Hotel is clean & gym is good too.

title: Lovely rooms
desc: The suites are really nice, pictures are very accurate and the room has one of the nicer toilets well equipped with Jacuzzi. The exterior of the hotel may not look fantastic, but the interior is completely different. It was a pleasant surprise. I believe that the reservation team could be more helpful though, some of the minor requests raised during the reservation process was forgotten during check in, thought thankfully quickly resolved by the maintanence team.

title: Kind hotel
desc: We are a family of six people. The staff is kind to arrange rooms on the same floor. There is a free storage of baggage till evening it is convenient can also take shower at the pool before go to the airport. Strongly recommend.

title: Business
desc: My office is just walking distance from M Hotel, location is near to many places for eating and sight seeing. Reception staff are always smiling. Breakfast at the caf√© are nice to start with every morning. All in all a quiet and decent hotel to stay

title: All right.
desc: The location of the hotel, the big room, the hotel cleanliness, the check in and check out, the cafe 2000, J bar was all good and right. Those staffs that I met and talked to are all friendly and helpful. One of the best service I had staying in a hotel.

title: Birthday
desc: Stay in M hotel for my friend's Birthday celebration. Service was fast to all our request. M hotel deliver a piece cake to my friend which is a little surprise. Thank you M team for the wonderful service.

title: March 2018
desc: I've stayed in M Hotel for couple of times already. Average is good. Except few issue sometimes, such as the water pressure of the shower is not strong enough, found some mosquito in bathroom, no slipper. Can do better especially room cleaning.

title: Fantastic stay
desc: We stayed at this hotel as a stopover for 2 Days in Singapore. Reading the reviews it was mixed on the location but all other features matched our expectations. Well we weren‚Äôt disappointed it is fabulous. The room rate compared to most Singapore hotels is very reasonable and the rooms are immaculate and large. Check-in and check out is very easy and the staff are just wonderful. Don‚Äôt be swayed by the location being in the business district as it is a short walk to La Pa Sat and also Maxwell Street Markets. It you do decide to shop or go outside the area taxi fares are very cheap (around $6 - $10 dollars). The only thing I think could be improved is the breakfast, but this is a minor issue on what was a great experience for us. Would definitely recommend and will be

title: Good as expected
desc: Selected this hotel after reading much review on the web and came to the hotel with high expectation. The hotel did not fail to deliver in all aspect. The staff were all very friendly and courteous. Amenities were all up to standard with everything a traveller need. Room is spacious with ample room for our luggages. Did not had our meals there so was not able to comment on that. Overall this is a very good hotel for any travellers.

title: Service well
desc: Good location. Near to many places Service well done by staff First room noisy after change room was nice and quiet. Breakfast room also many nice food and good service If come back will choose this hotel

title: Awesome stay
desc: We went to the Club Floor for our breakfast and the staffs (Sharen and Kai Sheng) greeted us with much enthusiasm! I think such little things like greetings are really important as can affect our mood for the day thus im really pleased by them. Variety of food there was not disappointing at all, can be very filling if you tried everything like us! Next, we wanted to tour around the city areas but were quite clueless about where to go. However, their concierge guys (Paul and Wan) were very knowledgable and informative about that area. They suggested a few places, recommended the transport to be taken and even the timing to go! (For instance we should go gardens by the bay at night to watch the lightings). They even helped us to circle out the places on the map before handing it

title: Convenient hotel
desc: We stayed a night at M Hotel last saturday, attended a concert at the Star Performing Art Centre, located at Buona Vista. We chose M Hotel due to it's location at Tanjong Pagar, which is about 10 minutes walking distance from the SMRT station, also the same line between Changi Airport and Buona Vista. It is a cheaper but decent choice compared to two other newer hotels in the area, which is Sofitel and Oasia Downtown. The hotel is an old hotel, the interior design is dated, however, comfortable and clean enough for a good stay. The free wifi is fast. The buffet breakfast of the hotel is an issue as the dining area is too small to cater for the guests. The food selection was limited, comparing to the normal high standard of Asian's hotels of similar standard. The level of

title: In city for conference.
desc: Was in Singapore in April for conference and stayed at M Hotel in Anson Road. Very clean hotel, staff were helpful and food choice was good. Perfect for location for business trip in business district.

title: Visit to Singapore
desc: Front desk staff didn't weldome, didn't ask how was my day, disn't show a smile. You don't feel very welcome. Gym material in very bad condition. Poor breakfast. Cigarrete smell came to the roon through the ventilation.

title: Singapore M Hotel @ Anson Road
desc: The room is spacious with very good WIFI Internet. But the location is not ideal for a leisure holiday. It may be good for business stay as it is located i n the financial district. The same breakfast was menu served throughout our stay of 8-days 7-nights. The cafe/restaurants around that area closed early in the evening and over the weekend. Pretty hard to find food in the evening unless you walk to Lau Pa Sat or market near Orchid Hotel. There is a 7-11 convenient store and McDonald in the next building. Overall, if the price can be cheaper, it could be a good trade-off.

title: Great hotel but...
desc: stayed here last April during a business workshop.Immensely enjoyed my stay save for 2 not-so-good experiences; upon checking in approximately 200 dollars was blocked on my credit card,presumably as collateral in case i devoured the contents of the refrigerator in the room.(I sensed some degree of mistrust) Then on the eve of my departure,a letter was slipped under my door 'reminding' me that i was to vacate the room by 10am the next morning.I deemed this to be rather offensive and unnecessary.It felt as if i was being hounded out.

title: Very good experience and a comfortable stay
desc: M hotel delivered quality, comfort, and great service. - Staff: Very polite and well trained - Rooms: Quite spacious, comfortable and neat - Food: Great - Service: Very prompt and satisfying. Received a surprise cake for my birthday, which was very sweet of the staff. - Location: Central, convenient to all key attractions and business centers. - Cafe: Quite nice

title: Service best
desc: I was here for business trip.cafe and room service was good. Lobby staff are very helpful and fast. Valery who attended to me is professional and kind. Thank you M Hotel for the wonderful stay. I will come back here to stay when i come to Singapore

title: Excellent Hotel with Spacious rooms.
desc: Excellent Hotel. We have stayed for 5 days in Premium Room. Its a 4 star hotel ,near to all Major attractions like Marina Bay Sands,Singapore Flyer,Gardens by the Bay, Santosa with in 6KM range. Easy access to Taxi, MRT stations(Tanjong Pager). It has all major amenities like Swimming pool, gym , Spa. Spacious rooms ,neatly maintained, Comfy beds.Staff are very gracious and friendly.Good breakfast buffet selection . I would strongly recommend others. We had a pleasant stay at M Hotels, We will visit again :) . If you have small kids go for "Ask Alfred‚Äô Children's Concierge Service" . If your looking for Indian restaurants , Sarvanabhavan Restaurant is just 5 min walk in AXA Building ground floor , you can also find other Indian small restaurants like Akbar, Banana leaf Curry

title: Good hotel
desc: I came here to have my lunch at the cafe. The food was delicious and many. The cafe staff are helpful and friendly. I wait for my company to pick me up to the airport. Ms Valery was kind and helpful to help me with the wifi

title: M Hotel Review
desc: It is good enough to give recommendations to my friends. First night, the room seemed to be a bit noisy when I heard someone running on the upper stair. However the room is cleaned well and the location is convenient.

title: Friendly hotel
desc: We need to wait for our room to be ready become we needed room close to our friends. Friendly front desk staff give us welcome drinks at the tea area while waiting for the room, never expect that. Cafe staff was friendly and helpful too. Will come back to this friendly hotel again.

title: Decent hotel
desc: A decent hotel with all the basic facilities for a business traveler. There is a gym and a outdoor swimming pool. Cafe serve good buffet dinner at a reasonable price. One good thing to talk about is all staff are helpful and friendly. Definitely a good place to stay.

title: Happy
desc: We stayed in M hotel for two days only. We enjoyed ourselves so much, we wanted to extend longer period but due to work commitments we need to leave. Thank you M hotel team for a wonderful stay. Hope to come back again

title: Highly recommended
desc: Stayed in M Hotel 5 nights for business trip. The room is quiet with a nice view. The hotel staff are helpful. Hotel is near to Tanjong Pager MRT station which make travelling convenient. Thank you Valery from front office for the daily cheerful morning greetings and always with the same beautiful smile. I am looking forward to staying here again.

title: Special Place in My Heart
desc: Hotels are all the same. What sets it apart is the service. The service here was exceptional. My thanks to the concierge who went of of their way to help me. Other staff members were friendly but these two gentleman were simply amazing!

title: Nice room design
desc: Value for money hotel. I love the design of the room make me feel cosy. Good location, walking distance to MRT station, breakfast is good. Weekends is a quiet area, most shops are closed. Overall we enjoy our stay

title: One of the best for business
desc: Stayed there for a week. Rooms are good. Service is good. Precious conference halls and good arrangements. Snacks are very interesting and there is variety of snacks. Food and bar are too good. It's a road touch location. Half hour from airport.

title: Excellent services throughout! With that human touch done to point.
desc: We held our wedding banquet at M hotel and their services were excellent throughout the pre-arrangement, on actual day of banquet and post-staying. Special credits to Atika, the catering manager and Kent, the banquet manager for their outstanding services. Atika replied to enquires promptly and managed to fulfill most of our requests efficiently. She came to assure that everything runs well too on the Banquet day itself. Kent is the most efficient staff we have ever met. He gave his best and pay attention to the slightest details that even our family wouldn‚Äôt notice. He is always there to help me change out my bridal heels to in room slippers at the right time to make sure I‚Äôm comfortable throughout the banquet. Pass us water and drinks from time to time to make sure we are

title: Highly recommended!
desc: This is my second time to stay at M Hotel and hopefully won't be the last! Staff are very gracious and accommodating, rooms are clean and spacious, good breakfast buffet selection, and strategic location (near Tanjong Pagar Metro station). They offer complimentary pillows special pillows too. I have a spinal problem so, I was thrilled that they have contoured pillows :-) Special thanks to Lolita for the free room upgrade from 2 twin beds to 1 double bed :-)

title: A pleasant and memorable stay.
desc: I like the suite which comes with a huge bathtub. The jacuzzi was not working though. Checking in and out was fast but there was no service with a smile, almost robot-like. Probably we are locals? Request for late checkout was granted and we were thankful. The staff servicing outside the lift lobby area and the room cleaners are the only ones with smile when they met us.

title: Fantastic
desc: Checking in and out was hassle free. Friendly and efficient service provided by Valery and Alice from Front Office. My friends and I had a wonderful staycation at M Hotel and we will definitely return again. Thank you for the warm hospitality!

title: 2nd time visit
desc: Location is great. There‚Äôs macdonalds, supermarket and convenience store nearby. Room rate is inclusive of hotel breakfast. Check in was swift. Room size is relatively big as compared to other hotels. The bad thing is that the room door is not exactly sound-proof, so light sleepers may not sleep well when the cleaners are vacuuming the corridor or people walking past your room talking loudly.

title: First impressions count
desc: I am a frequent visitor to Singapore delivering conferences and training and have stayed and delivered at many ‚Äúbusiness hotels‚Äù. I stay in club rooms and so feel that my comments have some validity but are from a personal perspective. First impressions count I know because human relationships and behaviour is my thing. So this review is being written on my first day of a 9 night stay not the last. Arrived at around 9 am on a Sunday morning tired after a long flight. Went straight to concierge asked for club check in. No questions my suitcase and I was taken directly to the lift and i was directed to the 28th floor. The check in process was quick and efficient and only a cursory mention made of cost of early room check-in no hard sell. I opted for spending the morning waiting

title: Best Service!!
desc: Would like to compliment Miss Vishalini on her willingness to help with every matter, including a much-appreciated room upgrade. She ensured our stay was a rather pleasant one, she‚Äôs a true asset to M Hotel!

title: Perfect for meetings
desc: Perfectly located in the financial district. Big rooms and good restaurants. It offers a small swimming pool, a gym and a SPA (this last one I didn't try). Breakfast is very good. Lunch at buffet ok the first time, then quite repetitive. Very friendly and prepared staff

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Good hotel with nice big rooms. The rooms come with a nice view of the harbor. Staff are also very friendly and very chatty.. Feels more of a friend then in other hotels which staff talk to u in too professional manner. I guess different people have different thoughts on that. Food in cafe is decent with many choices.

title: Quality Rooms with flaws in Service
desc: Had a short staycation at M Hotel Singapore last week as I was looking for a short getaway and a place where I can relax and do my work. I chose M Hotel for the fact that they offered smoking room. Upon arrival, check-in staff weren't welcoming and smiling. Just felt like being part of a process they didn't enjoy. Worst it felt like as a local Singaporean, they didn't welcome my business. I paid extra for the Premier Room and I really did enjoy the spaciousness of the room. Washroom was clean and overall carpet was clean. Wi-Fi was quick. However TV wasn't clear and Air-con was not working really well. Room service was good (had the Pasta and Fish and Chips!) but the prices seem really exorbitant. Coke goes for $8 per can... you get my point. Room service staff was really

title: Very small rooms
desc: Very small rooms feels claustrophobic and making me feel uncomfortable specially in the new wing. Limited Menu in restaurant. Rooms were clean and functional though.The location is also good. I was put up by my company otherwise I would never stay in such small room.

title: Corporate hotel
desc: For me the hotel was all too corporate. Everything is efficient just impersonal and feels rude. Reception checked us in with little words and no welcome. Similarly at breakfast. A lot of pointing and little smiles. The rooms are however large with a comfortable bed and it was a good location for my needs. Although it‚Äôs a business trip I prefer more customer service and niceties but I know that‚Äôs not for everyone.

title: My hotel of choice
desc: M Hotel is my preferred hotel for my business trips in Singapore. Good location, well maintained rooms and even better service and staff who make each stay comfortable. I always choose to stay here and no regrets each time! Thank you to the friendly staff, especially Lolita who helped me check in during my last visit.

title: Great hotel
desc: Great hotel in the heart of the city. Close to everything. The service was exceptional. Friendly, quick and makes you feel part of an experience. Recommend highly for anyone coming to Singapore for a visit.

title: Good and clean Hotel
desc: Good and clean hotel, located near a metro station. Breakfast was very good, offering a wide choice of different options. A 7eleven supermarket is round the corner. Staff was very friendly and helpful throughout the stay.

title: Reliable as always
desc: I‚Äôm a big fan of the M Hotel and it has now become my first choice when visiting Singapore. Its very conveniently located for me for business purposes and its close access to Tanjong Pagar MRT makes it ideal. The rooms are comfortable and quiet, something you can‚Äôt always take for granted in Singapore.

title: OK for business, but not for leisure - no views
desc: This hotel was clean and comfortable and set in the business district, so was quite some way from any of the main Singapore attractions. It was showing its age as the bathrooms were very small and the breakfast area was cramped. My room looked out onto a building site, so had no view and no sun. One good thing was it was quiet overnight as the window seals were good. There was no help with my luggage on arrival which I really needed. I would not go back myself, but it was comfortable enough.

title: Sincere service
desc: My booking was not found when i check in and there is some miscommunication about us having breakfast with the rate we are paying. We were rejected by the cafe host and after checking with the front desk it was already 10.15, 15mins for breakfast? We are disappointed and spoke to the staff, the manager was apologetic and she offer us breakfast in room. Ms Valery is understanding and genuine in service. The telephone department boy is also helpful and patient. We will come back for more staycation. Well done!

title: Cafe2000
desc: Love the spirit in cafe2000. Feels like family whenever I visit. Service was great. Firuz was very cheerful and brightens our day. Specially thanks to Chef ken for my special request. Definitely will visit again

title: A decent 4 star
desc: 3rd time here and is always up to what i expect it to be. Good hotel great service good food and amazing views from the room. The only set back is , there is some renovation works happening outside the hotel can be a little irritating..
